job_description_formatted:
OVERVIEW

We are hiring a Crypto Quantitative Researcher to join our Research team. The role focuses on building, testing, and optimising automated trading strategies across crypto spot, perpetual futures, DEXs, and CEXs. You will leverage on-chain data, order-book statistics, liquidity flow, and macro signals to generate robust alpha.


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Analyze and study market trends and fluctuations: capital flow trends, prominent ecosystems, on-chain and off-chain indicators, etc., to build trading signals.
  • Research, develop, and test crypto trading strategies.
  • Build back-testing systems for data.
  • Monitor and optimize the performance of live trading bots.
  • Work directly with developers (DEV) to deploy models into live bots.


REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE

  • Experience: ≥ 1 year in a research or similar role at an investment fund, prop-trading firm, or equivalent.
  • Proficient with Nansen, Arkham, Dexscreener, GMGN, Dune, CryptoRank, etc.
  • Able to decode transactions, read ABIs, and work with RPC / API for EVM and Solana.
  • Back-Testing: Experience building frameworks from scratch or using Backtrader, Zipline, etc.
  • Data Handling: Comfortable with tick-level, order-book-level, and liquidity-flow analysis.
  • Strong ability to detect bias and prevent overfitting.
  • Domain Knowledge: Solid understanding of DeFi, DEX/CEX mechanics, liquidity pools, MEV, and arbitrage.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Hands-on experience with time-series analysis, statistical modelling, or machine learning in trading.
  • Proven track record of profitable crypto strategies.
  • Deep knowledge of the Solana and broader EVM ecosystems.
  • Base: Ha Noi/Hung Yen


BENEFITS

  • Competitive salary (based on your experience).
  • Performance bonus linked to strategy results.
  • Fast-paced startup environment with direct bot deployment.

job_description_formatted:
About Sky Mavis

Sky Mavis is building the future of gaming. We’re the creators of Axie Infinity, the most successful Web3 game ever, and Ronin, a purpose-built blockchain that ranked as the 4th most-used chain in 2024, behind Ethereum, Bitcoin, and Solana.

We’ve processed over $4.3 billion in on-chain volume and are backed by more than $170 million from top-tier investors, including a16z, Accel, Libertus Capital, and Paradigm.

Our team moves fast, builds with intention, and believes in a world where players truly own what they earn. If you’re excited by open economies, massive scale, and shaping new digital frontiers, join us.

About The Role

We’re looking for a Lead Product Designer to own and drive the design vision for Ronin, including its wallet, bridge, staking interface, validator dashboard, and other related user-facing and developer tools.

This role is ideal for a systems thinker who thrives at the intersection of user experience, decentralized infrastructure, and Web3 usability. You’ll work closely with product, engineering, growth, and community teams to design intuitive and impactful experiences that help scale the Ronin ecosystem.

What You’ll Do

  • Own the end-to-end product design process for Ronin, from research and ideation to prototyping, visual design, and delivery.
  • Design thoughtful and scalable systems across complex Web3 user journeys (wallets, bridging, staking, validation, and more).
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and deliver product strategy and roadmap.
  • Advocate for user needs, backed by research, data, and industry insights.
  • Lead design critiques and mentor junior designers working on Ronin or related products.
  • Maintain a high standard of craft while balancing speed, constraints, and ambiguity.

What We Look For

  • 8+ years of experience in product design, with at least 3 years in a Lead or Senior role.
  • Proven track record of designing user-centric products, ideally in fintech, crypto, developer tools, or infrastructure platforms.
  • Strong understanding of interaction design, UX principles, and information architecture.
  • Ability to turn complex technical concepts into simple, elegant UI/UX.
  • Experience with design systems, prototyping tools (Figma preferred), and collaborative workflows.
  • Familiarity with Web3 or deep curiosity to dive into blockchain technology.
  • Excellent communication and leadership skills, you're comfortable driving alignment across teams.

job_summary: Project Lead / Solution Architect We are looking for an experienced Project Lead / Solution Architect with deep expertise in ERPNext and the Frappe Framework to lead the backend ERP development for a property management platform. This role will oversee solution design, customization, and integration of ERPNext to meet specific real estate operations needs, and coordinate with the internal front-end development team to ensure end-to-end system coherence. Map business requirements to ERPNext features and determine where customization or extensions are needed. Project & Technical Leadership Act as the main technical liaison between the ERPNext development team and internal product stakeholders. Guide and supervise ERPNext developers in implementing robust, scalable customizations (e.g. Lease Management, Billing Logic, Maintenance Scheduling). ERPNext Customization & Development Design and implement new DocTypes (e.g., Lease, Property, Application) and extend standard ones with custom fields. Design and expose secure REST API endpoints for Next.js and React Native frontends. Documentation & QA Support Produce technical documentation, data model diagrams, and admin guides for all customizations. Support staging and UAT cycles and respond to critical issues during and after go-live. Proven experience designing and delivering custom ERPNext apps for complex business domains. Strong Python and JavaScript coding skills (for server/client scripts). Knowledge of accounting, CRM, and project modules in ERPNext. Experience integrating ERPNext with external services via REST APIs and webhooks. Familiarity with ERPNext‚Äôs permission rules, notifications, and document workflow system. Excellent communication and documentation skills. Prior experience as a lead developer, architect, or technical project lead on ERP projects. What We Offer Experience in the property management domain. Familiarity with DevOps for ERPNext deployments (e.g., bench, Docker, backups). Knowledge of document signing tools (e.g., DocuSign), payment integrations (e.g., Stripe, Mollie), or calendar APIs. Benefits & Perks An open mind and flat structure where every voice is welcome. A work environment built on transparency, seamless communication, trust, and a sensible approach ,combined with mixed cultures and a speaking environment Individual assessments every 6 weeks with your line manager Performance review every 6 months 15 days of annual leave and + 6 days of fully paid sick leave per year ‚Äì can be used for the care of sick child Christmas Holiday Competitive salary Bonus: 13th-month Salary Social insurance for employees who pass their probation Show more Show less
job_description_formatted:
Project Lead / Solution Architect

We are looking for an experienced Project Lead / Solution Architect with deep expertise in ERPNext and the Frappe Framework to lead the backend ERP development for a property management platform. This role will oversee solution design, customization, and integration of ERPNext to meet specific real estate operations needs, and coordinate with the internal front-end development team to ensure end-to-end system coherence.


ResponsibilitiesThe Project Lead / Solution Architect will be responsible for one of the following tasks:

Solution Architecture & System Design

  • Lead the architectural design of the ERPNext system, including custom apps, DocTypes, workflows, and integration strategies.
  • Map business requirements to ERPNext features and determine where customization or extensions are needed.

Project & Technical Leadership

  • Act as the main technical liaison between the ERPNext development team and internal product stakeholders.
  • Guide and supervise ERPNext developers in implementing robust, scalable customizations (e.g. Lease Management, Billing Logic, Maintenance Scheduling).

ERPNext Customization & Development

  • Design and implement new DocTypes (e.g., Lease, Property, Application) and extend standard ones with custom fields.
  • Build server scripts, client scripts, and Frappe workflows for automation (e.g., rent invoicing, lease expiry reminders).
  • Ensure compliance with best practices to maintain system upgradeability.

Integration Ownership

  • Lead integration efforts with external systems such as payment gateways (e.g. Stripe), e-signature (e.g. DocuSign), calendar APIs (e.g. Google Calendar), WhatsApp bots, and AI verification services.
  • Design and expose secure REST API endpoints for Next.js and React Native frontends.

Documentation & QA Support

  • Produce technical documentation, data model diagrams, and admin guides for all customizations.
  • Collaborate with QA engineers to define and validate test cases (unit and integration level).

Deployment & Support

  • Assist in preparing the ERPNext production environment.
  • Support staging and UAT cycles and respond to critical issues during and after go-live.


Requirements

The Project Lead / Solution Architect will report directly to the Line Manager and will possess the following attributes:

  • 6+ years of experience in Software Development
  • 3+ years hands-on experience with ERPNext/Frappe Framework.
  • Proven experience designing and delivering custom ERPNext apps for complex business domains.
  • Strong Python and JavaScript coding skills (for server/client scripts).
  • Knowledge of accounting, CRM, and project modules in ERPNext.
  • Experience integrating ERPNext with external services via REST APIs and webhooks.
  • Familiarity with ERPNext’s permission rules, notifications, and document workflow system.
  • Excellent communication and documentation skills.
  • Prior experience as a lead developer, architect, or technical project lead on ERP projects.


What We Offer


  • Experience in the property management domain.
  • Familiarity with DevOps for ERPNext deployments (e.g., bench, Docker, backups).
  • Knowledge of document signing tools (e.g., DocuSign), payment integrations (e.g., Stripe, Mollie), or calendar APIs.
Benefits & Perks
  • An open mind and flat structure where every voice is welcome.
  • A work environment built on transparency, seamless communication, trust, and a sensible approach ,combined with mixed cultures and a speaking environment
  • Individual assessments every 6 weeks with your line manager
  • Performance review every 6 months
  • 15 days of annual leave and + 6 days of fully paid sick leave per year – can be used for the care of sick child
  • Christmas Holiday
  • Competitive salary
  • Bonus: 13th-month Salary
  • Social insurance for employees who pass their probation

job_description_formatted:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates.

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Coding, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.

Although every project is unique, you might typically:

  • Code generation and code review
  • Prompt evaluation and complex data annotation
  • Training and evaluation of large language models
  • Benchmarking and agent-based code execution in sandboxed environments
  • Working across multiple programming languages (Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Rust, SQL, etc.)
  • Adapting guidelines for new domains and use cases
  • Following project-specific rubrics and requirements
  • Collaborating with project leads, solution engineers, and supply managers on complex or experimental projects

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
  • You have at least 3 years of professional experience with Rust and hands-on experience with Rust testing tools (e.g., cargo test, property-based testing with quickcheck)
  • Familiarity with Rust tooling (Cargo, Clippy, rustfmt), module and crate management
  • Experience with code review, quality analysis, and identifying/fixing code smells and type issues⁠
  • Familiar with test integration in CI/CD environments
  • Experience using, integrating, or tutoring others with AI solutions or LLMs in Rust/test automation contexts
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

Role Overview

Senior Azure Cloud Platform Engineer will play a key part in designing, implementing, and optimizing company’s Azure cloud infrastructure solutions. The ideal candidate will bring a strong background in cloud technologies, hands-on experience with implementation of infrastructure as code (IaC) approach with leveraging tools such as Azure ARM templates and Azure Bicep and Kubernetes to automate and deliver Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS) and Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions based on industry best practices and current trends. You will be responsible to provision and manage of cloud infrastructure on Azure public cloud to support organizational needs. You will work closely with IT and Software development teams to ensure the delivery of best of breed solutions that meet or exceed RTO/RPO requirements.

The selected candidate should have extensive experience in Azure as well as design of containerized solutions based on Azure Kubernetes Services.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, build and deliver Azure native cloud solutions to support organizational migration to the cloud.
  • Configure and implement monitoring functionalities to provide best visibility and transparency to level 1 support teams.
  • Train junior members of the team to deliver best of breed solutions on top of Azure public cloud.
  • Design and manage upgrade and migration life cycles for all systems that are hosted in Azure cloud.
  • Participate in production incidents resolution task force to minimize downtime.
  • Be part of network and security design for all infrastructure and applications hosted in Azure.
  • Provide support to software development and RnD teams to evaluate, implement and monitor technology solutions.
  • Continuously promote better ways to deliver Infrastructure solutions on Azure cloud.
  • Propose adoption of new approaches, patterns, techniques, and ideas recommended by industry standards and industry trends.
  • Work closely with IT, Software development and RnD teams to understand pain points of current solutions and identify better approaches to hosting company’s solutions on the cloud.


Experience:

  • 5+ years of proven experience in delivering infrastructure solutions on Azure cloud.
  • 5+ years of hands-on with infrastructure design and deployment utilizing PaaS, SaaS and IaaS cloud offerings.
  • 5+ years working with Azure ARM templates and Azure Biceps
  • 3+ years of hands-on experience designing, building, and deploying containerized runtime environments based on Azure Kubernetes Services
  • Provent experience with scripting languages like: PowerShell, Python, JavaScript


Qualifications:

  • AZ-104 (Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate) - required
  • AZ-305 (Designing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions) – required
  • CKA (Certified Kubernetes Administrator) - required
  • Solid expertise using code repositories like GIT is a must.
  • Experience delivering deployment solutions using GitOps approach is a big plus
  • Strong analytic, conceptual, and problem-solving abilities with attention to detail
  • Flexible and able to adapt to operational requirements and priority changes.
  • Self-motivated, team player, tasks coordination, action Adapt to changes in technology and results oriented.
  • Well organized, good communication and reporting skills
  • Strong understanding of the software deployment life cycle


This role requires candidates to have their core working hours aligned with business operations in either Europe or North America, depending on assignment. Successful candidates must be able to work within these time zones to support regional offices, ensure effective collaboration, and provide timely operational support. Flexibility may be required for occasional meetings or critical incidents outside of core hours.


We are an equal opportunity employer dedicated to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace. We prioritize hiring the best candidates based on their skills and qualifications, irrespective of race, gender, age, religion, or any other characteristic. Our strength lies in our diverse teams, and we proudly celebrate and empower everyone to embrace and promote diversity throughout their time with us.

  • Company: itworks.asia's Client

We are looking for a skilled Fullstack Developer with experience in Python, React and AWS to join our team.   • Lead or mentor developers, setting high engineering standards and sharing best practices.

  • Expertise in React.js and TypeScript for front-end development.
  • Proven experience working with PostgreSQL, building scalable APIs (GraphQL/REST)
  • Hands-on experience with Docker/Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Strong communication skills in English and Vietnamese.

NICE TO HAVE

  • Experience building mapping and spatial application such as with ArcGIS
  • Experience with Tornado web server in Python

  • Annual bonus, performance-based bonus.
  • Monthly compensation package to help you work and live better, remotely!
  • Fully support for exams to get Certification and skills improvement training.

job_description_formatted:
About Us

DHL Supply Chain, part of the EUR 56.6bn DPDHL Group, is the world’s leading contract logistics provider. Combining value-added and management services with traditional fulfilment and distribution, our customized, integrated logistics solutions drive efficiency, improve quality and create competitive advantage.

DHL Supply Chain offers specialist, proven expertise within the Automotive, Consumer, Chemicals, Energy, Engineering & Manufacturing, Life Sciences & Healthcare, Retail and Technology sectors. As today’s global markets grow, our innovative logistics solutions are ready to help.

Responsibilities


  • Understand Supply Chain business, especially Transport operations to provide excellent IT service delivery to business
  • Participate in TMS setup, system testing, user training, UAT support and other deliverables of TMS deployment projects.
  • Support daily TMS related issues & user queries, so that Operation can use TMS properly and effectively
  • Drive TMS usage KPI through reporting and process improvement
  • Support system change request, and coordinate with requester to implement per Change Management process
  • Explore new system functionalities and new technologies(RPA, PowerBI, etc.) in order to support Transport Digitalization


Requirements

Must-have


  • 5+ work experience in IT industry - either as IT System Supervisor, Tech Lead, Tech Consultant, or BA/Product Owner
  • MS Office skills - Word, Excel, PowerPoint, MS Project, Visio and Collaboration tools
  • Intermediate knowledge in Network topologies and System designs
  • Experience in implementing MIS - system configuration & testing, interface design, reports development
  • Logical thinking with good programming skills in C#, VB.NET, SQL queries
  • Project management skills, as a Project Leader or a Project Manager
  • Ability to work under pressure and multi-tasking when needed
  • Enthusiasm and Carefulness, to be right at first-time
  • Innovative Mindset, able to take initiative in process improvement, system enhancement
  • Flexibility & Reliability - minimal supervision required
  • Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Logistics, or related disciplines
  • Good command of English
  • Strong communication skills both written and verbal, to be able to cooperate with cross-department teams


Nice-to-have


  • Experience in the Supply Chain Industry and/or Transport operations
  • Knowledge of IT product life cycle, ITIL, and Network Administration
  • Work experience in an international corporation

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

  • Mövenpick Resort Phan Thiet is located in a prime location on Hon Gio street, Phan Thiet city, Binh Thuan province. The resort is located near the romantic beach, with a long stretch of fine white sand and emerald green sea water, bringing visitors beautiful natural scenery and fresh, cool atmosphere.

Job Description

Responsible for the operational efficiency of all Front Office areas during the night shift and for ensuring exceptional service delivery in accordance with Mövenpick standards. This role is in charge of managing night operations, supervising staff, ensuring smooth check-in/check-out processes, and handling guest concerns professionally and promptly.

Chịu trách nhiệm đảm bảo hiệu quả vận hành của toàn bộ khu vực Tiền sảnh trong ca đêm và duy trì chất lượng dịch vụ theo tiêu chuẩn của Mövenpick. Vị trí này sẽ giám sát hoạt động ca đêm, quản lý nhân sự, hỗ trợ quy trình nhận/trả phòng và xử lý các tình huống của khách hàng một cách chuyên nghiệp và kịp thời.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities (Nhiệm vụ và trách nhiệm chính)

Conduct shift briefings to communicate daily operations and key hotel activities.

Thực hiện họp giao ca để truyền đạt các hoạt động chính và yêu cầu vận hành trong ca.

Provide input and feedback during Front Office meetings.

Đóng góp ý kiến trong các cuộc họp của bộ phận Tiền sảnh.

Supervise Front Office Night Operations Including

Giám sát các hoạt động của bộ phận tiền sảnh trong ca đêm, bao gồm:

Maintaining accurate guest information

Cập nhật và duy trì thông tin khách hàng chính xác.

Keeping up-to-date records of local events and attractions

Cập nhật thông tin về sự kiện, điểm tham quan tại địa phương.

Compiling and analyzing occupancy statistics

Tổng hợp và phân tích dữ liệu công suất phòng.

Supervising the use of the public address system

Giám sát việc sử dụng hệ thống loa công cộng.

Overseeing group bookings and coordination

Quản lý và phối hợp đặt phòng theo đoàn.

Assisting in handling serious guest complaints and escalating to the Duty Manager when necessary

Hỗ trợ xử lý các khiếu nại nghiêm trọng và báo cáo ngay cho Quản lý Trực khi cần.

Supervise Cashiering Duties During The Night Shift

Giám sát công việc thu ngân trong ca đêm:

Ensuring proper cash handling and banking procedures

Đảm bảo quy trình thu – chi và nộp tiền ngân hàng được thực hiện chính xác.

Handling irregular or disputed payments

Xử lý các khoản thanh toán không hợp lệ hoặc tranh chấp.

Training staff on credit policies and facilities

Hướng dẫn nhân viên về chính sách tín dụng và phương thức thanh toán.

Enforcing cash handling and security procedures

Đảm bảo quy trình an toàn trong quản lý tiền mặt.

Conducting debtor control and preparing financial reports

Kiểm soát công nợ và chuẩn bị báo cáo tài chính.

Overseeing the cashiering system and transactions

Giám sát toàn bộ hệ thống và quy trình thu ngân.

Be familiar with emergency evacuation and fire procedures, and take the lead if necessary.

Nắm vững quy trình sơ tán và xử lý sự cố cháy nổ, sẵn sàng thực hiện nhiệm vụ trong các tình huống khẩn cấp.

Participate in the execution of emergency response plans, including during fires, power failures, or bomb threats.

Tham gia thực hiện các kế hoạch ứng phó khẩn cấp như cháy nổ, mất điện hoặc đe dọa đánh bom.

Support Superior and Human Resources with manpower planning and staff management during night hours.

Hỗ trợ Quản lý Trực và bộ phận Nhân sự trong việc lập kế hoạch nhân sự và quản lý nhân viên ca đêm.

Assist Superior and Director of Finance in departmental budget preparation and control.

Hỗ trợ Quản lý và Giám đốc Tài chính trong việc xây dựng và kiểm soát ngân sách bộ phận.

Perform any other duties as assigned by Mövenpick Resort Phan Thiet’s management.

Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo yêu cầu của Ban Quản lý Mövenpick Resort Phan Thiết.

Qualifications

  • Diploma or Vocational Certificate in Hotel Administration, Hotel Management or equivalent
  • 1 years experience in front office / guest services or related discipline including supervisory experience, or an equivalent combination of education and experience.
  • Communication skills are utilized a significant amount of time when interacting with others; demonstrated ability to interact with customers, employees and third parties that reflects highly on the hotel, the brand and the Company
  • Proficient in the use of Microsoft Office and OPERA
  • Problem solving and organizational abilities.
  • Experience in the Hospitality industry. Fluent in both spoken and written English and Vietnamese.

job_description_formatted:
1. About AIxBlock

AIxBlock is an unified platform for AI development and AI automation workflows, built for AI engineers.

Visit our website for more information.


Our DNA is a globally distributed company that allows you to work fully remotely with flexible working hours, we always work with folks from all walks of life with no borders.

2. Job type:

  • Flexible working hours from Monday to Saturday, ensuring 44+hrs. We need A players, who can work like hell, if you prefer a 9-5 job, this might not be a suitable company for you.


3. Location: Work from anywhere.


4. Number of headcount: 01


5. Reporting Line: CEO


6. Responsibilities: We are seeking a proactive HR Executive to generally manage our HR functions. This role involves handling various HR responsibilities and support CEO on overall HR strategy to attract, develop, and retain top talent.

👉🏻 Talent Management (60%)

  • Plan and execute full recruitment circle for positions in marketing agencies.
  • Develop and maintain TA strategies to attract high-quality candidates.
  • Work with team leaders for performance management to evaluate employee performance effectively.

👉🏻 Total Rewards (20%)

  • Maintain compensation and benefits packages.
  • Improve company policies with the aim of decent work for employees

👉🏻 Organizational Development (10%)

  • Act as the main contact point for employees regarding HR inquiries.
  • Facilitate training programs to enhance employee skills and career growth.
  • Promote a healthy workplace culture that fosters employee engagement.

👉🏻 Other Functions (10%)

  • Support CEO on HR strategies and internal communications.
  • Address employee relations issues and facilitate conflict resolution.
  • Maintain accurate employee records and ensure compliance with labor laws.


7. Requirements: We welcome young talents who are eager to embrace challenges and are passionate about thriving in a startup culture.

  • Minimum of 2 years of experience as an HR Generalist or in a related role.
  • Understanding of the startup working environment.
  • Comfortable with remote setup with a flexible approach to tasks.
  • Excellent English communication skills is a MUST, both written and verbal
  • Strong organizational skills with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
  • An accountable and proactive person.


8. Compensation & Benefits:

a. Compensation:

  • Base salary: Negotiated salary depending on experience.
  • Token award based on Company policy.

b. Benefits:

  • Salary review quarterly depending on the performance
  • Birthday gift
  • Holiday gift.
  • Year End Performance Bonus (Cash)
  • Year-end party.

c. Leaves:

  • Public holidays. Take time off and spend it with your family during your country’s public holiday.
  • Annual leave: 12 days/year and to be pro-rata rated for the actual monthly working period for full-time staff. Applied after the probation.
  • Sick leave with pay: maximum 6 days/year, on top of the 12-day annual leave credit, for full-time staff. Applied after the probation
  • Personal leave policy for special cases.

d. Training and recognition

  • Employee Stock Option Plan (ESOP) can be applied after a (1) year working contribution, depending on the Company’s business results and the individual’s performance.
  • Performance recognition and promotion opportunities for consistently good performance.
  • External/internal training programs.

e. Working environment

  • Fully remote.
  • Flexible working hours, divide your working hour within a day and week to work then enjoy your work-life balance style.
  • Startup working environment with young and talented people across the globe.
  • The opportunity to meet and work with global professionals around the world to expand your network.


9. Application process:

  • Resume & Portfolio screening
  • Interview with the HR Executive
  • Interview with the CEO
  • Offer discussion and contract Signing

job_description_formatted:
WhaleLO Luggage Storage – là chuỗi dịch vụ gửi hành lý đầu tiên và lớn nhất tại Việt Nam, kết nối du khách có nhu cầu gửi hành lý với các khách sạn có thể hỗ trợ giữ đồ. Các khách sạn đối tác có thể tận dụng cơ sở vật chất và nguồn lực sẵn có để tăng thêm thu nhập một cách hợp pháp và thuận tiện nhờ vào WhaleLO.

Website: www.whalelo.net

Video giới thiệu chi tiết: https://youtu.be/li959pJ6d6k


1. JOB DESCRIPTION

  • Tìm kiếm và đánh giá các khách sạn tiềm năng ở nước ngoài để phục vụ cho nhu cầu phát triển điểm trông giữ hành lý (quốc gia sẽ do chính ứng viên đăng ký)
  • Liên hệ online qua whatsapp, viber,... và thiết lập meeting online để thuyết phục khách sạn hợp tác với WhaleLO (Khách sạn hoàn toàn không mất phí khi hợp tác mà còn được share hoa hồng khi có đơn hàng phát sinh).
  • Chăm sóc, phát triển và hỗ trợ xử lý các vấn đề phát sinh trong quan hệ đối với các khách sạn và đối tác
  • Báo cáo công việc hàng ngày theo yêu cầu của quản lý trực tiếp


Lưu ý: toàn bộ công việc trên đều thực hiện online và có sự lệch múi giờ quốc tế. Nên WhaleLo chấp nhận ứng viên làm như 1 sidejob. Tuy nhiên phải đảm bảo cam kết về kết quả công việc.


2. REQUIREMENTS

  • Tiếng Anh trôi chảy: 4 kỹ năng nghe, nói, đọc, viết
  • Có 1 - 5 kinh nghiệm làm việc trong các lĩnh vực sau: sales B2B, partnerships, các ứng dụng booking như Agoda, Booking.com, Traveloka,...
  • Chủ động và tự giác do tính chất làm việc từ xa (Work From Home)


3. BENEFITS

  • Mức lương: Lương cứng + bonus trên kết quả công việc (Tổng thu nhập 15 -20 triệu/ tháng).


Chính sách chi tiết tại đây:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-IA-sQNXhjwpjH1TTnvcme72b0fWw_3f/view


  • 100% work from home, vì vậy bạn có thể làm như 1 công việc chính hoặc công việc phụ (side job)
  • Tham gia vào startup đang tăng trưởng, có nhiều không gian sáng tạo và chủ động.
  • Cơ hội trở thành nhân sự cốt lõi khi startup scale-up.
  • Cơ hội phát triển lên các vị trí team leader khi mở rộng.


4. THỜI GIAN LÀM VIỆC

  • Do đây là vị trí remote nên chúng tôi không quản lý thời gian công việc, chỉ quản lý dựa trên hiệu suất làm việc. Tuy nhiên trong khung giờ làm việc từ 8h00 - 18h00 (nghỉ trưa 12h00 - 14h00) nếu cộng sự nào cần hỗ trợ, hãy đảm bảo rằng chúng tôi có thể liên hệ bạn trong khung này.


Chúng tôi sẽ liên hệ với các ứng viên phù hợp trong vòng 5 ngày làm việc. Cảm ơn bạn đã quan tâm đến cơ hội nghề nghiệp tại WhaleLO!

job_summary: AweSM Sales and Marketing, a Singapore-based remote company, is seeking a 100% Technical Account Manager Our company's purpose is to transform the lives of our clients and help them transform the lives of their clients! Our customers are European (mainly Scandinavian) experts, coaches, consultants, and speakers who want to scale their businesses (selling courses and programs online). You'll love coming to work every day if you get, want, and have the capacity to: Independently manage multiple client accounts, overseeing their marketing projects from planning to execution while ensuring technical excellence in implementation Build and optimize marketing funnels, including setting up ad campaigns in Meta and YouTube, creating high-converting landing pages, and implementing email automation using tools like Kajabi, Simplero, Kartra, Keap Plan project timelines, manage tasks, and ensure quality delivery while maintaining clear communication with both team members and clients Monitor and optimize performance metrics daily, making data-driven decisions to adjust campaigns and funnels when KPIs aren't meeting expectations Implement technical solutions to improve efficiency, including system integrations using tools like Zapier and make.com Take ownership of client success by identifying opportunities for improvement in both project processes and technical implementations We are looking for a person who: Has expert knowledge of marketing funnels and technical setup using various systems Has proven experience with project management and client communication Has experience running ads on Meta and/or YouTube with daily budgets of 1000$ + Is a strong independent worker who can lead projects while maintaining high technical standards Has excellent written and verbal communication skills in English Is number- and results-driven while maintaining attention to detail Loves to work remotely and is tech-savvy Is interested in continuously learning about digital marketing and sales in the online coaching/course space Speaking and writing Norwegian or Swedish is a big bonus but not a must. You will enjoy working for AweSM if you resonate with and live our values: Customer-oriented: we deliver AweSM results for our clients - with love One-step ahead: we show the way; we take risks to help clients see what‚Äôs possible Growth-mindset: we always challenge ourselves to be better Open & honest: we say the truth, we are willing to share both our brilliance and our vulnerabilities This is a 100% remote position, and we don't care where you are as long as you have access to a computer and Wi-Fi. However, all our team members are in Europe/Asia, so our team meetings and communication mainly happen between these time zones. Our clients are in Europe time zone. Our company runs on EOS (The entrepreneurial operating system). As a technical account manager, you report to our operations manager. If you are interested, please send your CV and a short video telling us why you are the right person for this position to recruitment@awesm.com . This position will be doing regular Zoom calls with team & clients and therefore we want to ‚Äúfeel‚Äù you in a short video to save every ones time in a screening process! We look forward to hearing from you. Show more Show less
job_description_formatted:
AweSM Sales and Marketing, a Singapore-based remote company, is seeking a 100% Technical Account Manager

Our company's purpose is to transform the lives of our clients and help them transform the lives of their clients!

Our customers are European (mainly Scandinavian) experts, coaches, consultants, and speakers who want to scale their businesses (selling courses and programs online).

You'll love coming to work every day if you get, want, and have the capacity to:

  • Independently manage multiple client accounts, overseeing their marketing projects from planning to execution while ensuring technical excellence in implementation
  • Build and optimize marketing funnels, including setting up ad campaigns in Meta and YouTube, creating high-converting landing pages, and implementing email automation using tools like Kajabi, Simplero, Kartra, Keap
  • Plan project timelines, manage tasks, and ensure quality delivery while maintaining clear communication with both team members and clients
  • Monitor and optimize performance metrics daily, making data-driven decisions to adjust campaigns and funnels when KPIs aren't meeting expectations
  • Implement technical solutions to improve efficiency, including system integrations using tools like Zapier and make.com
  • Take ownership of client success by identifying opportunities for improvement in both project processes and technical implementations

We are looking for a person who:

  • Has expert knowledge of marketing funnels and technical setup using various systems
  • Has proven experience with project management and client communication
  • Has experience running ads on Meta and/or YouTube with daily budgets of 1000$ +
  • Is a strong independent worker who can lead projects while maintaining high technical standards
  • Has excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
  • Is number- and results-driven while maintaining attention to detail
  • Loves to work remotely and is tech-savvy
  • Is interested in continuously learning about digital marketing and sales in the online coaching/course space
  • Speaking and writing Norwegian or Swedish is a big bonus but not a must.


You will enjoy working for AweSM if you resonate with and live our values:


  • Customer-oriented: we deliver AweSM results for our clients - with love
  • One-step ahead: we show the way; we take risks to help clients see what’s possible
  • Growth-mindset: we always challenge ourselves to be better
  • Open & honest: we say the truth, we are willing to share both our brilliance and our vulnerabilities


This is a 100% remote position, and we don't care where you are as long as you have access to a computer and Wi-Fi. However, all our team members are in Europe/Asia, so our team meetings and communication mainly happen between these time zones. Our clients are in Europe time zone.


Our company runs on EOS (The entrepreneurial operating system). As a technical account manager, you report to our operations manager. 


If you are interested, please send your CV and a short video telling us why you are the right person for this position to recruitment@awesm.com. This position will be doing regular Zoom calls with team & clients and therefore we want to “feel” you in a short video to save every ones time in a screening process!


We look forward to hearing from you.

job_description_formatted:
Global Vision Multimedia is a regional most trusted end-to-end provider of multimedia delivery solutions for audio visual, broadcast media, information technology and other related fields that utilize multimedia technologies.

We are offer candidates the good career growth path in a good cohesive working environment.

The Role

Position: Procurement & Admin Associate

Job Type: Full-time

  • Pay: 13,000,000₫ - 18,000,000₫ per month

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide general office and administrative support to ensure efficient day-to-day operations.
  • Responsible for accurate data entry, including updating Invoice & Delivery Order (DO) numbers upon receipt from suppliers.
  • Assist in creating Purchase Orders (POs) and Delivery Orders.
  • Coordinate and monitor both import and export shipments, ensuring timely and accurate handling.
  • Assist in delivery arrangements to project sites or clients.
  • Check and verify part numbers and quantities during goods receiving.
  • Liaise and coordinate with Store, Service, and Project departments to support ongoing operations.
  • Report to the immediate superior and provide regular status updates.
  • Manage inventory of office supplies, including stationery and pantry items, and replenish as needed.
  • Handle ad-hoc duties as assigned by management.
  • Communicate and collaborate effectively across teams within the APAC region.

Ideal Profile

Qualifications & Requirements

  • Diploma or higher in Business Administration, Logistics, or related fields.
  • Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
  • Proficient in English.
  • Bonus if able to read and write in Korean and Japanese.
  • Able to work both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
  • Strong skills in Microsoft Office applications, especially Word and Excel.
  • Excellent organizational, communication, and multitasking abilities.
  • Prior experience in logistics, procurement, or cross-border coordination is an added advantage.

What's on Offer?

  • A role that offers a breadth of learning opportunities
  • Opportunity to make a positive impact
  • Opportunities for career growth & development

Athleta unleashes the potential of every woman, regardless of body size, age or ethnicity. Banana Republic believes in sustainable luxury for all. And Gap inspires the world to bring individuality to modern, responsibly made essentials. This simple idea-that we all deserve to belong, and on our own terms-is core to who we are as a company and how we make decisions. Ready to learn fast, create with audacity and lead boldly? Join our team. About The Role In this role, you will be accountable for the development process and strategy execution for the assigned fabric/product departments. You will also be responsible to execute the overall country and mill/vendor strategy for the department in partnership with the relevant internal teams. Our brands bridge the gaps we see in the world. Old Navy democratizes style to ensure everyone has access to quality fashion at every price point. Athleta unleashes the potential of every woman, regardless of body size, age or ethnicity. Banana Republic believes in sustainable luxury for all. job_description_formatted:
Location: Remote - Fulltime

Salary: $700 - $900


About the Role

We are looking for a Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer with strong experience in both manual and automation testing. You will be responsible for ensuring product quality through thorough test planning, execution, and automation implementation, while collaborating closely with cross-functional teams.

Key Responsibilities

  • Perform manual testing with a strong focus on structured, efficient testing cycles.
  • Design, execute, and maintain both manual and automated test cases to validate product features, user flows, and business requirements.
  • Log bugs with complete documentation: steps to reproduce, expected vs. actual results, screenshots, and recordings where needed.
  • Collaborate with developers to investigate and identify potential root causes of defects.
  • Proactively suggest and implement QA process improvements to increase coverage and efficiency.
  • Recommend better verification techniques to prevent regression and recurring issues.
  • Participate in product reviews and ensure testing strategies align with business requirements.

Skills & Qualifications

  • Minimum 1 year of hand-on experience in Automation testing and/or solid knowledge of cryptocurrency and blockchain fundamentals.
  • Good English communication skills, especially in reading and writing test documentation, bug reports, and team communication.
  • Strong attention to detail with a methodical approach to testing.
  • Proven track record of high bug-logging accuracy and detailed documentation.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Nice to Have:

  • Ability to design and establish an automation testing process.
  • Understanding of Agile methodologies and continuous integration practices.

To apply: Please send your CV to [jobs+qa@remitano.com] with the Subject Line “Quality Assurance"

Note: CV file name must not contain special characters, Vietnamese accents, and spaces.

job_summary: About Locofy.ai Locofy.ai is a fully remote (Singapore HQ) startup, building a low code development devtool platform to help accelerate developers & designers to launch their core web/mobile products 5-10x faster. Having raised $7.5M in seed funding from the likes of Northstar Ventures, Accel, January Capital, Golden-Gate Ventures, BoldCap and backed by founders of Dropbox, Ola, Lottiefiles, Hasura, Holistics, Wego, Paysense, GajiGesa, Ohmyhome, 1bstories, Cyber-Sierra, it launched its beta platform in January 2022. We're young, but we've made some serious progress - our Product Hunt launch in July 2022 was really encouraging and our community feedback has been strong! We got #1 Product of the Day, Week and Month subsequently along with #1 Developer Tool and #1 Design Tool of the Day, Week and Month, and it's been a crazy ride ever since! After running Locofy.ai in free public beta for 3.5 years, Locofy.ai recently came out of beta with paid plans in September 2024 and very rapidly sold 1000+ subscriptions with 50+ Enterprises. The founders have held CxO roles in Product & Technology at some of Asia‚Äôs top startups covering Gaming, Travel, Fintech, Healthtech and SaaS, and won multiple awards for their products globally. After years building these products, they‚Äôre now determined to build a devtools SaaS platform from South-East Asia to improve the lives of product & engineering teams globally! At the heart of everything, Locofy's mission is to build for builders i.e. developers, designers & product managers. As builders ourselves, we want to allow anyone with any idea to be able to build world-class products with lean teams, by empowering their teams with digital steroids to move faster! Reports To Head of Engineering (but work closely with both founders & founding employees) Job Location Vietnam (Remote) Job Overview We are seeking an experienced and hands-on Lead Engineer to lead the company‚Äôs technology efforts. You will be working in the extremely challenging low-code design to code domain and you will be responsible for end to end development of the platform, starting from prioritisation of the roadmap, solutioning with PMs and leading squads all the way to launch. The candidate has to be almost obsessed with web/app development to the point that they can dare to automate their own work (i.e. code). The ideal candidate is someone who is very strong at problem solving, able to lead squads, have expertise in various mobile and web frontend-end tech stacks and frameworks and also loves being hands on with coding the most complex parts. The candidate should be able to propose solutions that benefit the wider mobile & web development communities globally. We‚Äôre building for engineers, and we expect to build nothing short of perfection! Responsibilities and Duties You‚Äôll own the development of the Locofy.ai plugins and Builder. You will be in charge of architecting, building and managing key components like design to code generation, supporting existing design tools and tech stacks combinations (Figma, AdobeXD to React, React Native, Nextjs, Gatsby, HTML-CSS, Vue and Angular) and also helping build new solutions for Sketch, Svelte, Flutter etc while extend the utility of the overall platform to beyond design to code. You will be involved in all aspects of the product including product design, platform strategy and development. Some more responsibilities include: Working closely with the Head of Engineering, the founders, PMs and designers to spec, build and iterate the platform to help solve problems for web & mobile app developers. You will be in charge of solutioning for some of our most challenging projects. While a strong grasp of front-end concepts is essential for this role, it‚Äôs just the starting point. The true priority is problem-solving‚Äîyou‚Äôll frequently tackle complex, ambiguous challenges that impact thousands of developers. Lead and manage different squads, provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members, and more importantly build the most complex parts Design and develop well-structured and scalable architecture Implement latest development trends and establish best practices Troubleshoot user reported issues and resolve them Continuously improve the code quality and user experience through testing and feedbacks from the team Requirements Total Experience as an engineer : 7+ years with 3+ years of experience in technical lead roles Super passionate/obsessed about web and app development to the point that you can automate your own code Strong experience building web applications in common web frameworks and libraries and its best practices Experience building products in a fast moving startup is mandatory given the nature of the job Experience building lightweight UI libraries from scratch Experience writing well optimized CSS & Javascript, understands how code minification works and able to resolve cross browser compatibility issues Demonstrate strong ownership and accountability while thriving under high-pressure situations Ability to work effectively in a remote collaborative environment Apply on Linkedin if interested! Show more Show less

job_poster.name: Tien N****n
job_poster.title: Build product, tech, people

job_description_formatted:
About Locofy.ai


Locofy.ai is a fully remote (Singapore HQ) startup, building a low code development devtool platform to help accelerate developers & designers to launch their core web/mobile products 5-10x faster. Having raised $7.5M in seed funding from the likes of Northstar Ventures, Accel, January Capital, Golden-Gate Ventures, BoldCap and backed by founders of Dropbox, Ola, Lottiefiles, Hasura, Holistics, Wego, Paysense, GajiGesa, Ohmyhome, 1bstories, Cyber-Sierra, it launched its beta platform in January 2022.


We're young, but we've made some serious progress - our Product Hunt launch in July 2022 was really encouraging and our community feedback has been strong! We got #1 Product of the Day, Week and Month subsequently along with #1 Developer Tool and #1 Design Tool of the Day, Week and Month, and it's been a crazy ride ever since!


After running Locofy.ai in free public beta for 3.5 years, Locofy.ai recently came out of beta with paid plans in September 2024 and very rapidly sold 1000+ subscriptions with 50+ Enterprises.


The founders have held CxO roles in Product & Technology at some of Asia’s top startups covering Gaming, Travel, Fintech, Healthtech and SaaS, and won multiple awards for their products globally. After years building these products, they’re now determined to build a devtools SaaS platform from South-East Asia to improve the lives of product & engineering teams globally!


At the heart of everything, Locofy's mission is to build for builders i.e. developers, designers & product managers. As builders ourselves, we want to allow anyone with any idea to be able to build world-class products with lean teams, by empowering their teams with digital steroids to move faster!


Reports To

Head of Engineering (but work closely with both founders & founding employees)

Job Location

Vietnam (Remote)

Job Overview

We are seeking an experienced and hands-on Lead Engineer to lead the company’s technology efforts. You will be working in the extremely challenging low-code design to code domain and you will be responsible for end to end development of the platform, starting from prioritisation of the roadmap, solutioning with PMs and leading squads all the way to launch. The candidate has to be almost obsessed with web/app development to the point that they can dare to automate their own work (i.e. code). The ideal candidate is someone who is very strong at problem solving, able to lead squads, have expertise in various mobile and web frontend-end tech stacks and frameworks and also loves being hands on with coding the most complex parts. The candidate should be able to propose solutions that benefit the wider mobile & web development communities globally. We’re building for engineers, and we expect to build nothing short of perfection!

Responsibilities and Duties

You’ll own the development of the Locofy.ai plugins and Builder. You will be in charge of architecting, building and managing key components like design to code generation, supporting existing design tools and tech stacks combinations (Figma, AdobeXD to React, React Native, Nextjs, Gatsby, HTML-CSS, Vue and Angular) and also helping build new solutions for Sketch, Svelte, Flutter etc while extend the utility of the overall platform to beyond design to code. You will be involved in all aspects of the product including product design, platform strategy and development. Some more responsibilities include:

  • Working closely with the Head of Engineering, the founders, PMs and designers to spec, build and iterate the platform to help solve problems for web & mobile app developers. You will be in charge of solutioning for some of our most challenging projects.
  • While a strong grasp of front-end concepts is essential for this role, it’s just the starting point. The true priority is problem-solving—you’ll frequently tackle complex, ambiguous challenges that impact thousands of developers.
  • Lead and manage different squads, provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members, and more importantly build the most complex parts
  • Design and develop well-structured and scalable architecture
  • Implement latest development trends and establish best practices
  • Troubleshoot user reported issues and resolve them
  • Continuously improve the code quality and user experience through testing and feedbacks from the team
Requirements
  • Total Experience as an engineer : 7+ years with 3+ years of experience in technical lead roles
  • Super passionate/obsessed about web and app development to the point that you can automate your own code
  • Strong experience building web applications in common web frameworks and libraries and its best practices
  • Experience building products in a fast moving startup is mandatory given the nature of the job
  • Experience building lightweight UI libraries from scratch
  • Experience writing well optimized CSS & Javascript, understands how code minification works and able to resolve cross browser compatibility issues
  • Demonstrate strong ownership and accountability while thriving under high-pressure situations
  • Ability to work effectively in a remote collaborative environment


Apply on Linkedin if interested!

Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications. Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems. Maintain code quality, organization, and automation. Work closely with other engineers to integrate backend systems with our frontend services. Develop the next-generation AI agent platform. Requirements Qualifications : -A minimum of 3 years of proven experience in backend development. Solid understanding of Java fundamentals including JVM, I/O, concurrent and multi-thread programming. Good understanding of microservice, familiar with service discovery, communication, load balance and distributed job management. Experience with Kubernetes is a plus. Proficiency in MySQL; experience with NoSQL databases (Redis/Dynamodb) is a significant plus. job_description_formatted:
Description

Responsibilities:

  • Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code for our backend systems.
  • Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
  • Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems.
  • Maintain code quality, organization, and automation.
  • Work closely with other engineers to integrate backend systems with our frontend services.
  • Develop the next-generation AI agent platform.

Requirements

Qualifications:

  • -A minimum of 3 years of proven experience in backend development.
  • Solid understanding of Java fundamentals including JVM, I/O, concurrent and multi-thread programming.
  • Good understanding of microservice, familiar with service discovery, communication, load balance and distributed job management. Experience with Kubernetes is a plus.
  • Proficiency in MySQL; experience with NoSQL databases (Redis/Dynamodb) is a significant plus.
  • Experience with elasticsearch is a plus
  • Familiarity with frontend technologies and platforms, including web development, web security, and HTTP/HTTPS protocols.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a love for programming and a keen eye for clean, efficient coding practices.
  • Excellent verbal and written English communication skills, with strong time management capabilities.

job_description_formatted:
WhaleLO Luggage Storage – là chuỗi dịch vụ gửi hành lý đầu tiên và lớn nhất tại Việt Nam, kết nối du khách có nhu cầu gửi hành lý với các khách sạn có thể hỗ trợ giữ đồ. Các khách sạn đối tác có thể tận dụng cơ sở vật chất và nguồn lực sẵn có để tăng thêm thu nhập một cách hợp pháp và thuận tiện nhờ vào WhaleLO.

Website: www.whalelo.net

Video giới thiệu chi tiết: https://youtu.be/li959pJ6d6k


1. JOB DESCRIPTION

  • Tìm kiếm và đánh giá các khách sạn tiềm năng ở nước ngoài để phục vụ cho nhu cầu phát triển điểm trông giữ hành lý (quốc gia sẽ do chính ứng viên đăng ký)
  • Liên hệ online qua whatsapp, viber,... và thiết lập meeting online để thuyết phục khách sạn hợp tác với WhaleLO (Khách sạn hoàn toàn không mất phí khi hợp tác mà còn được share hoa hồng khi có đơn hàng phát sinh).
  • Chăm sóc, phát triển và hỗ trợ xử lý các vấn đề phát sinh trong quan hệ đối với các khách sạn và đối tác
  • Báo cáo công việc hàng ngày theo yêu cầu của quản lý trực tiếp


Lưu ý: toàn bộ công việc trên đều thực hiện online và có sự lệch múi giờ quốc tế. Nên WhaleLo chấp nhận ứng viên làm như 1 sidejob. Tuy nhiên phải đảm bảo cam kết về kết quả công việc.


2. REQUIREMENTS

  • Tiếng Anh trôi chảy: 4 kỹ năng nghe, nói, đọc, viết
  • Có 1 - 5 kinh nghiệm làm việc trong các lĩnh vực sau: sales B2B, partnerships, các ứng dụng booking như Agoda, Booking.com, Traveloka,...
  • Chủ động và tự giác do tính chất làm việc từ xa (Work From Home)


3. BENEFITS

  • Mức lương: Lương cứng + bonus trên kết quả công việc (Tổng thu nhập 15 -20 triệu/ tháng).


Chính sách chi tiết tại đây:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-IA-sQNXhjwpjH1TTnvcme72b0fWw_3f/view


  • 100% work from home, vì vậy bạn có thể làm như 1 công việc chính hoặc công việc phụ (side job)
  • Tham gia vào startup đang tăng trưởng, có nhiều không gian sáng tạo và chủ động.
  • Cơ hội trở thành nhân sự cốt lõi khi startup scale-up.
  • Cơ hội phát triển lên các vị trí team leader khi mở rộng.


4. THỜI GIAN LÀM VIỆC

  • Do đây là vị trí remote nên chúng tôi không quản lý thời gian công việc, chỉ quản lý dựa trên hiệu suất làm việc. Tuy nhiên trong khung giờ làm việc từ 8h00 - 18h00 (nghỉ trưa 12h00 - 14h00) nếu cộng sự nào cần hỗ trợ, hãy đảm bảo rằng chúng tôi có thể liên hệ bạn trong khung này.


Chúng tôi sẽ liên hệ với các ứng viên phù hợp trong vòng 5 ngày làm việc. Cảm ơn bạn đã quan tâm đến cơ hội nghề nghiệp tại WhaleLO!

job_poster.title: Talent Acquisition + Employer Branding | BBA

job_description_formatted:
VỊ TRÍ TUYỂN DỤNG:

1.Giáo viên tiếng Anh Online tại nhà (GTE)

  • Dạy nhóm nhỏ (1:5 hoặc 1:8) học sinh tiểu học, THCS trên nền tảng ClassIn.
  • Lớp học diễn ra vào buổi tối (khung giờ: 19h15, 20h00, 20h45) — đăng ký tối thiểu 3-4 buổi/tuần.
  • Học liệu và mẫu nhận xét đã được chuẩn bị sẵn để giáo viên dễ dàng triển khai.

2.Giáo viên Dlive

  • Dạy học sinh cấp 1 và cấp 2 theo hình thức 1:n qua ClassIn.
  • Yêu cầu trình độ tiếng Anh từ C1 trở lên và đã tốt nghiệp đại học.

3.Giáo viên kiểm tra đầu vào (OTE)

  • Phỏng vấn và đánh giá năng lực học sinh 1:1 qua Google Meet.
  • Lớp kéo dài 25 phút, thực hiện ít nhất 10 tiếng/tuần
  • Có hỗ trợ công cụ đánh giá bằng AI.

4.Giáo viên lớp Joy Class (kids từ 4-10 tuổi)


YÊU CẦU CHUNG:

  • Tuổi: 18–45.
  • Có kinh nghiệm giảng dạy từ 3- 6 tháng trở lê tại trung tâm/nhà hoặc trực tuyến.
  • Phát âm chuẩn Bắc/Nam, giọng rõ ràng, dễ nghe.
  • Ngoại hình sáng, có tác phong chuyên nghiệp.
  • Trang bị laptop cá nhân và đường truyền internet ổn định.


QUYỀN LỢI:

  • Thu nhập cạnh tranh
  • Đào tạo bài bản: được training kỹ năng sư phạm, quản lý lớp học, giao tiếp.
  • Làm việc linh hoạt: dạy tại nhà – quản lý thời gian chủ động.
  • Tham gia họp chuyên môn định kỳ cùng chuyên gia để nâng cao năng lực giảng dạy.
  • Cơ hội thưởng định kỳ theo năng lực và sự đóng góp

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team The Business Process Automation (BPA) team is a longstanding group within Grab Operations, dedicated to coding automation solutions across all countries and verticals. Their mission is to reduce manual work, enhance system connectivity, and develop bespoke scripts that drive organizational value. The team is composed of diverse professionals, including data analysts, full-stack engineers, problem solvers, and innovators. Get to Know the Role As a Software Engineer in Test, you will conduct manual quality assurance checks and write automated test scripts to ensure software quality. You'll also troubleshoot issues in software and implement automated testing strategies and tools. You will own, track and drive quality processes(eg postmortems, oncall) for the team. You'll collaborate with engineering, product, design and business teams, to help achieve the team's goals.. You will report to the Regional BPA - Automation Platform Manager and work onsite at Grab office, CMC Creative Space, D7, HCMC. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will provide functional and regression testing for web applications. You will develop automated test scripts using automation frameworks, maintaining and enhancing these scripts. You will implement both manual and automated functional and regression test cases, maintaining automated test scripts. You will debug failed test cases and report defects with clear details to lead closure. You will work with developers, product owners, test leads, and engineers to improve testing efficiencies and expand test coverage. You will define test plans, test specifications, test suites, test cases as well as proposed tools for functional, security, and performance testing in a programmatic manner. You will report to the Engineering Manager of the team. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need A degree in computer science, software engineering, information technology or related fields. 2+ years of experience as QA Engineer/Automation Engineer or Software Development Engineer. Solid understanding of test methodologies, test planning, test case design and test processes. Ability to debug failed test cases and report defects. Have hands-on coding experience with test automation, including script languages (Python) or other languages (Javascript, Go etc.) and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) frameworks such as Playwright, Selenium, Cucumber. Practical experience with SQL for database queries on metrics and testing. Experience using build and release pipeline tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD or equivalent. Have experience engaging with AI tools and emerging technologies to enhance productivity, improve workflows, and contribute new ideas. Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. Show more Show less
job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Business Process Automation (BPA) team is a longstanding group within Grab Operations, dedicated to coding automation solutions across all countries and verticals. Their mission is to reduce manual work, enhance system connectivity, and develop bespoke scripts that drive organizational value. The team is composed of diverse professionals, including data analysts, full-stack engineers, problem solvers, and innovators.

Get to Know the Role

As a Software Engineer in Test, you will conduct manual quality assurance checks and write automated test scripts to ensure software quality. You'll also troubleshoot issues in software and implement automated testing strategies and tools. You will own, track and drive quality processes(eg postmortems, oncall) for the team. You'll collaborate with engineering, product, design and business teams, to help achieve the team's goals..

You will report to the Regional BPA - Automation Platform Manager and work onsite at Grab office, CMC Creative Space, D7, HCMC.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will provide functional and regression testing for web applications.
  • You will develop automated test scripts using automation frameworks, maintaining and enhancing these scripts.
  • You will implement both manual and automated functional and regression test cases, maintaining automated test scripts.
  • You will debug failed test cases and report defects with clear details to lead closure.
  • You will work with developers, product owners, test leads, and engineers to improve testing efficiencies and expand test coverage.
  • You will define test plans, test specifications, test suites, test cases as well as proposed tools for functional, security, and performance testing in a programmatic manner.
  • You will report to the Engineering Manager of the team.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • A degree in computer science, software engineering, information technology or related fields.
  • 2+ years of experience as QA Engineer/Automation Engineer or Software Development Engineer.
  • Solid understanding of test methodologies, test planning, test case design and test processes. Ability to debug failed test cases and report defects.
  • Have hands-on coding experience with test automation, including script languages (Python) or other languages (Javascript, Go etc.) and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) frameworks such as Playwright, Selenium, Cucumber.
  • Practical experience with SQL for database queries on metrics and testing.
  • Experience using build and release pipeline tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD or equivalent.
  • Have experience engaging with AI tools and emerging technologies to enhance productivity, improve workflows, and contribute new ideas.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_summary: OUR HIRING PROCESS: We will review your application against our job requirements. We do not employ machine learning technologies during this phase as we believe every human deserves attention from another human. We do not think machines can evaluate your application quite like our seasoned recruiting professionals‚Äîevery person is unique. We promise to give your candidacy a fair and detailed assessment. We may then invite you to submit a video interview for the review of the hiring manager. This video interview is often followed by a test or short project that allows us to determine whether you will be a good fit for the team. At this point, we will invite you to interview with our hiring manager and/or the interview team. Please note: We do not conduct interviews via text message, Telegram, etc. and we never hire anyone into our organization without having met you face-to-face (or via Zoom). You will be invited to come to a live meeting or Zoom, where you will meet our INFUSE team. From there on, it‚Äôs decision time! OUR HIRING PROCESS:

  • We will review your application against our job requirements. We do not employ machine learning technologies during this phase as we believe every human deserves attention from another human. We do not think machines can evaluate your application quite like our seasoned recruiting professionals—every person is unique. We promise to give your candidacy a fair and detailed assessment.
  • We may then invite you to submit a video interview for the review of the hiring manager. This video interview is often followed by a test or short project that allows us to determine whether you will be a good fit for the team.
  • At this point, we will invite you to interview with our hiring manager and/or the interview team. Please note: We do not conduct interviews via text message, Telegram, etc. and we never hire anyone into our organization without having met you face-to-face (or via Zoom). You will be invited to come to a live meeting or Zoom, where you will meet our INFUSE team.
  • From there on, it’s decision time! If you are still excited to join INFUSE and we like you as much, we will have a conversation about your offer. We do not make offers without giving you the opportunity to speak with us live.

INFUSE is committed to complying with applicable data privacy and security laws and regulations. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy

Are you driven by the desire to deliver exceptional client experiences and thrive in a dynamic environment? At INFUSE, we're seeking a passionate Client Success Specialist to join our team, where your efforts directly contribute to our clients' satisfaction and our company's success. This position offers an enriching path to professional growth and the unique opportunity to work with a variety of industries, ensuring no two days are the same. INFUSE has built a reputation as a beloved employer by prioritizing employee satisfaction and creating a workplace where everyone feels valued and connected. Joining our team means becoming part of a supportive community that celebrates every success and encourages continuous improvement. You'll discover how our employees love their jobs, driven by the meaningful connections they make and the positive impact they have on our clients' businesses.

Key Responsibilities

  • Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships
  • Ensure the timely and successful delivery of our solutions according to client needs and objectives
  • Communicate clearly the progress of monthly/quarterly initiatives to internal and external stakeholders
  • Identify and grow opportunities within the territory and collaborate with sales teams to ensure growth attainment
  • Assist with challenging client requests or issue escalations as needed
  • Provide assistance across a variety of administrative and operational tasks, such as data entry, updating internal systems, or managing schedules.

Requirements

  • Proven track record of managing client relationships, preferably in a related field such as hospitality, client success, or sales
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills
  • Can handle various tasks with attention to detail, managing priorities effectively in a fast-paced environment.
  • Empathetic understanding of client needs and ability to address them effectively
  • Ability to address challenges and proactively offer solutions.

If you're passionate about building meaningful relationships and delivering top-notch client experiences, we'd love to hear from you.
