job_description_formatted:
🚨 Join Our Creative Team as a Senior SEO Content Writer at @Authority Gain!


Position Type:

⚡ Full-Time - Remote (Not Freelance or Project-Based)

⚡ Timings: 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM (Pakistan Standard Time)

⚡ Working Days: Monday to Friday


Why Authority Gain?

We are growing fast, and we want you to be part of it. At Authority Gain, we focus on semantic SEO and topical authority, working with top brands to create content that drives results. If you’re looking to improve your writing skills and grow in SEO, this is the place for you.


What You’ll Do:

💢 As a full-time SEO Content Writer, you’ll be an integral part of our team, not just a freelancer.

💢 Your role will directly contribute to our brand’s long-term content strategy and growth.

💢 Create engaging content such as blog posts, articles and more that captures attention and adds value.

💢 Conduct in-depth research to ensure all content is accurate, well-structured, and insightful.

💢 Deliver high-quality work on time, consistently meeting deadlines while maintaining standards.

💢 Write original, human-crafted, plagiarism-free content (AI-generated or copied work will not be accepted).

💢 Collaborate with editors and team members to align content with the goals.


Who We’re Looking For:

✔️ We want someone who is committed to a long-term, full-time role, not short-term projects.

✔️ 3 to 4 years of proven content writing experience, with a good understanding of SEO and digital content practices.

✔️ Strong writing skills: clear, concise, engaging, and grammatically accurate.

✔️ Research-driven mindset: able to dig into diverse topics and present them with accuracy and clarity.

✔️ Creative and adaptable writing style for different industries and target audiences.

✔️ Reliable team player with strong communication skills, comfortable working in a remote setup.


What’s in It for You?

🌱 Competitive salary (depending on your experience).

🌱 Opportunities to learn and grow in SEO.

🌱 Work with leading brands and improve your skills every day.


If you’re ready for a new challenge and want to grow with us, we’d love to hear from you!

job_summary: B. Braun Medical Inc., a leader in infusion therapy and pain management, develops, manufactures, and markets innovative medical products and services to the healthcare industry. Other key product areas include nutrition, pharmacy admixture and compounding, ostomy and wound care, and dialysis. The company is committed to eliminating preventable treatment errors and enhancing patient, clinician and environmental safety. B. Braun Medical is headquartered in Bethlehem, Pa., and is part of the B. Braun Group of Companies in the U.S., which includes B. Braun Interventional Systems, Aesculap¬Æ and CAPS¬Æ. Globally, the B. Braun Group of Companies employs more than 64,000 employees in 64 countries. Guided by its Sharing Expertise¬Æ philosophy, B. Braun continuously exchanges knowledge with customers, partners and clinicians to address the critical issues of improving care and lowering costs. To learn more about B. Braun Medical, visit www.bbraunusa.com Job Function - General: Develops and fosters positive working relationships with key customers, including high level clinical nurse leaders, i.e., CNOs, VPs, DONs, to support networking, presentations, publications and sharing of B. Braun success stories. Develop strong clinical networks within healthcare and professional organizations that increase B. Braun‚Äôs presence in the markets served. Strategically partners with the Director of Health Care Systems to build strong customer clinical relationships, demonstrate and create value with customer executive stakeholders and ensure long term success. Professional healthcare acumen ‚Äì understands the healthcare business environment (IDN, GPO, basics of contracts, basics of revenue cycle, supply chain, distribution, value analysis, etc.) and can engage in conversations/meetings Be immediately recognizable as a leader, possessing outstanding communication, listening and interpersonal skills with the ability to quickly establish credibility and rapport with a broad audience, to include senior level, C-Suite executives. Ability to design, interpret and communicate evidence-based outcomes, measures and research and then translate the evidence / results into practice. Direct experience with clinical and industry podium presentations, poster presentations, authorship, and publication highly preferred. Participates with internal multidisciplinary teams to improve the operational effectiveness of our Clinical Services Team. Leads annual strategic corporate account clinical reviews to discuss, SWOT and business plan 1 year and 3 years out. Leads and participates in the creation of new clinical value materials to help improve the performance of our team and customer satisfaction. Continuously innovates on customer support based on internal and external feedback. Develops clinical strategic plans, analyzes data and trends to set, modify and execute on strategies Gains input and trend information from major clinical groups through direct contact with such groups, organizations, and other vendors. Remains current with market trend information and competitive landscape. Demonstrates fiscal responsibility with allocated budgets and resources. Maintains key relationships with internal B. Braun departments (Sales, Marketing, Technical Services, Customer Service, etc.) Requirements: Valid RN license Minimum of Bachelors degree Minimum of 12 years related clinical experience Frequent business travel required Previous management experience required The job function listed is not exhaustive and shall also include any responsibilities as assigned by the Supervisor from time to time. #DL $135,000-$175,000 base plus incentive compensation(Salary varies based on region) The targeted range for this role takes into account a range of factors that are considered when making compensation and hiring decisions; included but not limited to: skill sets; experience and training; licensure and certifications; and other business and organizational needs. The disclosed range estimate has not been adjusted for the applicable geographic differential associated with the location at which the position may be filled. Compensation decisions are dependent on the facts and circumstances of each case. The range provided is a reasonable estimate. It is an essential function of this position for an employee to be present and in-person at the physical site(s) of our customers and potential customers. Many of our customers and potential customers are in clinical settings, including, but not limited to, hospitals, clinics, and other health care clinics (hereinafter, ‚ÄúHealthcare Customers‚Äù). Many of our Healthcare Customers require outside vendors like us to present proof that they have certain requisite vaccinations and immunizations, including, but not limited to, vaccinations against COVID-19 and seasonal influenza, before being granted entry into the Healthcare Customers‚Äô clinical settings. To gain access to our Healthcare Customers clinical settings, field sales, field service, and other customer facing professionals are required to register with the vendor credentialing organization associated with the Healthcare Customers, complete the Healthcare Customers‚Äô required process, and undergo a series of clearances. Vendor credentialing clearances include, but are not limited to, a national criminal background check, drug screening, and immunizations as determined by the vendors, which may include, but are not limited to, Influenza, Hepatitis B Virus, and COVID-19. You must fully comply with the requirements of the Healthcare Customers in your region, including any necessary proof of any vaccination. As such, all individuals in this position assigned to a Healthcare Customer with a COVID-19, Influenza, Hepatitis B Virus, or other vaccination requirement must be fully vaccinated and/or immunized in accordance with the Healthcare Customers‚Äô requirements. B. Braun Medical North America Companies complies with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) and applicable laws, and on receipt of an accommodation request will engage in the interactive process to assess possible reasonable accommodation options, if any, consistent with the ADA and applicable law. B. Braun offers an excellent benefits package, which includes healthcare, a 401(k) plan, and tuition reimbursement. To learn more about B. Braun and our safety healthcare products or view a listing of our employment opportunities, please visit us on the internet at www.bbraunusa.com. Through its ‚ÄúSharing Expertise¬Æ‚Äù initiative, B. Braun promotes best practices for continuous improvement of healthcare products and services. We are an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate applications without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, pregnancy, genetic information, disability, status as a protected veteran, or any other protected characteristic. job_description_formatted:
B. Braun Medical Inc., a leader in infusion therapy and pain management, develops, manufactures, and markets innovative medical products and services to the healthcare industry. Other key product areas include nutrition, pharmacy admixture and compounding, ostomy and wound care, and dialysis. The company is committed to eliminating preventable treatment errors and enhancing patient, clinician and environmental safety. B. Braun Medical is headquartered in Bethlehem, Pa., and is part of the B. Braun Group of Companies in the U.S., which includes B. Braun Interventional Systems, Aesculap® and CAPS®.

Globally, the B. Braun Group of Companies employs more than 64,000 employees in 64 countries. Guided by its Sharing Expertise® philosophy, B. Braun continuously exchanges knowledge with customers, partners and clinicians to address the critical issues of improving care and lowering costs. To learn more about B. Braun Medical, visit www.bbraunusa.com

Job Function - General:

  • Develops and fosters positive working relationships with key customers, including high level clinical nurse leaders, i.e., CNOs, VPs, DONs, to support networking, presentations, publications and sharing of B. Braun success stories.
  • Develop strong clinical networks within healthcare and professional organizations that increase B. Braun’s presence in the markets served.
  • Strategically partners with the Director of Health Care Systems to build strong customer clinical relationships, demonstrate and create value with customer executive stakeholders and ensure long term success.
  • Professional healthcare acumen – understands the healthcare business environment (IDN, GPO, basics of contracts, basics of revenue cycle, supply chain, distribution, value analysis, etc.) and can engage in conversations/meetings
  • Be immediately recognizable as a leader, possessing outstanding communication, listening and interpersonal skills with the ability to quickly establish credibility and rapport with a broad audience, to include senior level, C-Suite executives.
  • Ability to design, interpret and communicate evidence-based outcomes, measures and research and then translate the evidence / results into practice. Direct experience with clinical and industry podium presentations, poster presentations, authorship, and publication highly preferred.
  • Participates with internal multidisciplinary teams to improve the operational effectiveness of our Clinical Services Team.
  • Leads annual strategic corporate account clinical reviews to discuss, SWOT and business plan 1 year and 3 years out.
  • Leads and participates in the creation of new clinical value materials to help improve the performance of our team and customer satisfaction.
  • Continuously innovates on customer support based on internal and external feedback.
  • Develops clinical strategic plans, analyzes data and trends to set, modify and execute on strategies
  • Gains input and trend information from major clinical groups through direct contact with such groups, organizations, and other vendors.
  • Remains current with market trend information and competitive landscape.
  • Demonstrates fiscal responsibility with allocated budgets and resources.

Maintains key relationships with internal B. Braun departments (Sales, Marketing, Technical Services, Customer Service, etc.)

Requirements:

  • Valid RN license
  • Minimum of Bachelors degree
  • Minimum of 12 years related clinical experience
  • Frequent business travel required
  • Previous management experience required

The job function listed is not exhaustive and shall also include any responsibilities as assigned by the Supervisor from time to time.



#DL

$135,000-$175,000 base plus incentive compensation(Salary varies based on region)

The targeted range for this role takes into account a range of factors that are considered when making compensation and hiring decisions; included but not limited to: skill sets; experience and training; licensure and certifications; and other business and organizational needs. The disclosed range estimate has not been adjusted for the applicable geographic differential associated with the location at which the position may be filled. Compensation decisions are dependent on the facts and circumstances of each case. The range provided is a reasonable estimate.

It is an essential function of this position for an employee to be present and in-person at the physical site(s) of our customers and potential customers. Many of our customers and potential customers are in clinical settings, including, but not limited to, hospitals, clinics, and other health care clinics (hereinafter, “Healthcare Customers”). Many of our Healthcare Customers require outside vendors like us to present proof that they have certain requisite vaccinations and immunizations, including, but not limited to, vaccinations against COVID-19 and seasonal influenza, before being granted entry into the Healthcare Customers’ clinical settings. To gain access to our Healthcare Customers clinical settings, field sales, field service, and other customer facing professionals are required to register with the vendor credentialing organization associated with the Healthcare Customers, complete the Healthcare Customers’ required process, and undergo a series of clearances. Vendor credentialing clearances include, but are not limited to, a national criminal background check, drug screening, and immunizations as determined by the vendors, which may include, but are not limited to, Influenza, Hepatitis B Virus, and COVID-19. You must fully comply with the requirements of the Healthcare Customers in your region, including any necessary proof of any vaccination. As such, all individuals in this position assigned to a Healthcare Customer with a COVID-19, Influenza, Hepatitis B Virus, or other vaccination requirement must be fully vaccinated and/or immunized in accordance with the Healthcare Customers’ requirements. B. Braun Medical North America Companies complies with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) and applicable laws, and on receipt of an accommodation request will engage in the interactive process to assess possible reasonable accommodation options, if any, consistent with the ADA and applicable law.

B. Braun offers an excellent benefits package, which includes healthcare, a 401(k) plan, and tuition reimbursement. To learn more about B. Braun and our safety healthcare products or view a listing of our employment opportunities, please visit us on the internet at www.bbraunusa.com.

Through its “Sharing Expertise®” initiative, B. Braun promotes best practices for continuous improvement of healthcare products and services.

We are an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate applications without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, pregnancy, genetic information, disability, status as a protected veteran, or any other protected characteristic. job_description_formatted:
Job Description

1/ Duy trí các báo hiện tại

  • Duy trì và thực hiện việc gửi các báo cáo tới đội ngũ lãnh đạo và các bộ phận liên quan
  • Nghiên cứu tối ưu và rút gọn code báo cáo, rút gọn thời gian thực hiện báo cáo
  • Rút trích dữ liệu và làm báo cáo liên quan

2/ Phát triển báo cáo các chương trình thi đua

  • Xây dựng và phát triển các chương trình thi đua hỗ trợ cho đội ngũ kinh doanh
  • Hỗ trợ cung cấp dữ liệu của các chương trình thi đua từ Vùng
  • Hỗ trợ, tư vấn phòng CAO Office, PD xây dựng Memo các chương trình thi đua phù hợp các chỉ tiêu kinh doanh
  • Hỗ trợ phòng CAO Office, PD theo dõi tiến độ chi trả các chương trình thi đua
  • Xây dựng và cung cấp tiến độ, kết quả các chương trình thi đua cho kênh mới: đối tác (PD), và thu phí (ZPC1, ZPC2)
  • Phân tích, đánh giá, phát hiện rủi ro tiềm ẩn (nếu có) của chương trình thi đua
  • Xây dựng các báo cáo phân tích đánh giá hiệu quả các chương trình thi đua hằng tháng
  • Xây dựng và cung cấp tiến độ, kết quả các chương trình thi đua cho kênh mới IC

3/ Phát triển các báo cáo mới

  • Sử dụng các ngôn ngữ phân tích như Python/R
  • Phân tích các xu hướng, chỉ tiêu hiệu suất làm việc của các đại lý theo yêu cầu của trưởng phòng hoặc tự bản thân đề xuất
  • Sử dụng công cụ BI như Qlik Sense, PowerBi, Excel hoặc Python để trình bày báo cáo, biểu đồ
  • Tham gia review chính sách và phát triển báo cáo chỉ tiêu kinh doanh cho các kênh mới: đối tác (PD) và ZPC2
  • Xây dựng các báo cáo cho kênh mới IC

4/ Quản lý Server SQL

  • Kiểm tra và đảm bảo tính đúng đắn dữ liệu hằng ngày
  • Quản trị và phân quyền người dùng truy cập, sử dụng SQL Server
  • Tối ưu hoá kho dữ liệu SQL Server dành riêng cho các chương trình thi đua
  • Hỗ trợ phát triển và quản trị hệ thống cung cấp Master Raw Data, tự động cung cấp dữ liệu hằng ngay cho các đối tác (PD), và thu phí (ZPC1, ZPC2)
  • Cross check data mới từ IT để tính toán cho các CTTĐ cần data mới

5/ Phát triển kĩ năng quản lý

  • Hướng dẫn và giám sát các thành viên khác thực hiện công việc báo cáo chương trình thi đua

6/ Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của trưởng phòng/PTGĐ/GĐ

Qualifications

  • Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành Toán - Tin học, Công nghệ thông tin/Toán tài chính/Hệ thống thông tin
  • Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương
  • Thành thạo SQL Server,Excel. Sử dụng ngôn ngữ Python và Qlik Sense là các ưu thế
  • Trình độ Tiếng Anh có kỹ năng đọc và viết tốt
  • Trung thực, cẩn thận, tập trung, có trách nhiệm với công việc
  • Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt, kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề và xử lý tình huống tốt
  • Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và tinh thần đồng đội.

job_description_formatted:
Ready to make your next big professional move? Join us on our journey to achieve our big dream of building the most loved restaurant brands in the world.


Restaurant Brands International Inc. is one of the world's largest quick service restaurant companies with over $40 billion in annual system-wide sales and over 30,000 restaurants in more than 120 countries and territories. RBI owns four of the world's most prominent and iconic quick service restaurant brands – TIM HORTONS®, BURGER KING®, POPEYES®, and FIREHOUSE SUBS®. These independently operated brands have been serving their respective guests, franchisees and communities for decades. Through its Restaurant Brands for Good framework, RBI is improving sustainable outcomes related to its food, the planet, and people and communities.


RBI is committed to growing the TIM HORTONS®, BURGER KING®, POPEYES® and FIREHOUSE SUBS® brands by leveraging their respective core values, employee and franchisee relationships, and long track records of community support. Each brand benefits from the global scale and shared best practices that come from ownership by Restaurant Brands International Inc.


This is a fixed-term opportunity (12 months) with the possibility to extend the contract. This is a fully remote opportunity (within APAC).



Your responsibilities:

  • Review Kitchen Layout Submissions to ensure proper operational capability and flows
  • Manage proactively for new and complex layouts
  • Control, track, analyze Layout Approval Process to ensure maintenance and improvement
  • Advocate for our guests, restaurant crew and our Franchisees success
  • Implement, manage Layout Standards, supports in Standard Documents creation
  • Proactively provide trainings and education of layout standards to stakeholders
  • Collaborate in Layout Improvement Projects and support New Country Entries
  • Manage stakeholders to maintain good relationship


Your skills and experience:

  • Master’s Degree in Architecture or Engineering;
  • Advanced CAD experience, advanced knowledge of Excel is a plus;
  • Prior experience QSR industry and understanding of restaurant operations;
  • Experience in Store Layouts and Drive Thru Site Plans development process is highly desirable;
  • Ability to interpret restaurant plans, Drive Thru site plans and detailed technical drawings
  • Ability to visualize the inter-dependencies of constituents of restaurant operations
  • Fluency in English, knowledge of Mandarin would be a plus

Collaboration Betters The World, is a company providing tech et business solutions to its clients, through the expertise of its 9 service lines.

 

Coding, Quality and Architecture
● Deliver high quality, maintainable code
● Maintain a codebase and keep frameworks up to date, identify tech debt and improvements proactively
● Ensure testing meets any compliance requirements e.g. PI and GDPR
● Review and promote new testing tools and techniques
● Manage pull request approvals
● Apply a risk based approach to assessing all security aspects of a system/application
● Follow DevOps best practices and keep up with modern tooling
● Able to set architecture direction to integrate new architectural components
● On-call support


Continuous improvement & best practice
● Follows industry best practices with particular attention to maintainability, reusability, extensibility and clean code
● Ensure team adoption of coding, quality, accessibility and secure code standards
● Encourage innovation and foster an environment of continuous improvement
● Maintain a test and learn mindset with curiosity, collaboration and care

Collaboration & mentorship
● Ability to collaborate across different teams, and across all levels of seniority
● Provide coaching and mentoring to other team members
● Lead all interactions with trust empathy and clear communication
● Lead the team in the absence of the Technical Lead
● Actively participate in team collaboration sessions e.g. tech forums, brown bags, strategy meetings
● Able to communicate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders

 

● Ability to design, estimate and build high quality and maintainable code
● Ability to maintain a codebase and keep frameworks up to date, identify tech debt and improvements proactively
● Exceptional problem solving and troubleshooting skills
● Extensive experience crafting and building software using the latest delivery techniques
● An understanding of architectural concepts and cloud-based solution design
● Demonstrable ability to motivate self and others
● Experience working with technical and non-technical partners, with the capability to
influence
● Able to collaborate across different teams and across all levels of seniority
● Strong experience with Java, springboot and RabbitMQ.
● Banking/finance experience is favourable but not essential.

This position is essential in ensuring the seamless operation and continuous improvement of our software solutions, catering to the dynamic needs of our ecommerce business. Key Responsibilities Develop and maintain high-quality software solutions using PHP, Laravel, and Mango DB Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and define system requirements Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability Implement security and data protection measures Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members Participate in the design and architecture of new features and modules Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs Integrate data storage solutions Debug and resolve technical issues Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in software development Required Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field Proven experience in PHP and Laravel development Proficiency in Mango DB and database management Experience in developing SAAS ecommerce solutions Solid understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3 Knowledge of code versioning tools, such as Git Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail Strong communication and teamwork skills Experience in cloud technologies and deployment (AWS, Azure, etc.) Skills: cross-functional collaboration,front-end technologies,cloud technologies deployment,security measures implementation,ui/ux design feasibility,mango db,problem-solving,code versioning,ecommerce,code reviews,saas ecommerce,industry trend monitoring,php,laravel,task management,application optimization,saas,teamwork,data storage integration,system requirements gathering,communication skills Show more Show less

Overview

The Senior PHP Laravel & Mango DB Developer with experience in SAAS ecommerce plays a crucial role in our organization, contributing to the development and maintenance of our SAAS ecommerce platform. This position is essential in ensuring the seamless operation and continuous improvement of our software solutions, catering to the dynamic needs of our ecommerce business.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop and maintain high-quality software solutions using PHP, Laravel, and Mango DB
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and define system requirements
  • Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
  • Implement security and data protection measures
  • Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members
  • Participate in the design and architecture of new features and modules
  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
  • Integrate data storage solutions
  • Debug and resolve technical issues
  • Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in software development

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
  • Proven experience in PHP and Laravel development
  • Proficiency in Mango DB and database management
  • Experience in developing SAAS ecommerce solutions
  • Solid understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
  • Knowledge of code versioning tools, such as Git
  • Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail
  • Strong communication and teamwork skills
  • Experience in cloud technologies and deployment (AWS, Azure, etc.)

job_summary: About Us Since its inception, Arcstone has successfully delivered solutions to 200+innovative manufacturing companies globally. We are committed to finding and developing the best talents that will propel Arcstone forward. Arcstone is a digital manufacturing solutions provider that helps run factory floors and interconnect them to the global manufacturing supply chain. We welcome enterprise software development experts, manufacturing engineering talents, exceptional business developers, and other various roles who are ideally from the manufacturing sector. If you are ready to join a fast-paced, rapidly-growing company in a field poised for disruption, we want you! Job Description At Arcstone you will have the opportunity to work on several key software solutions that serve as a backbone for factories within a quickly evolving manufacturing and supply-chain industry. Our products are all B2B, so you will be speaking directly with clients and working with them in order to help deploy a full-fledged manufacturing execution system together with a supply chain integrated platform. Understanding our customer‚Äôs factory processes together with their supply chain operations is key to be able to configure out toolsets to help our customers improve their productivity, efficiency, transparency, and sustainability. What you‚Äôll be doing: Work directly with customers to set and deploy Arcstone's toolsets into their facilities Perform testing and validation of deployed toolsets to ensure functionality and performance Create advanced digital workflows, checklists, and dashboards to help digitalize manufacturing operations Perform advanced API integration work to customer‚Äôs ERP/MES/MOM/etc. while coordinating security conditions with IT teams Training customers on the usage of Arcstone toolsets and ensuring proper usage and validation of the data being collected Integration with hardware & equipment on the factory floor Requirements: Proven track record of working with data ranging from collection, and analysis to integration work Basic software development skillsets (VBA, JavaScript, Python, HTML, etc.) Basic SQL, query experience on large datasets and using visualization toolsets (PowerBI/Tableau/Grafana/etc.) Experience with hardware integration (OPC UA, MODBUS, MQTT, etc.) Friendly and customer-centric attitude Excellent communication skills with the ability to tactfully influence, negotiate, and resolve conflicts Comfort with ambiguity, uncertainty, and a dynamic business landscape Self-motivated and driven to excel and deliver, able to handle stress with a positive attitude Team player with no ego and a collaborative attitude Open to travel (potentially globally!) Good-to-have skills: Previous manufacturing software usage experience (MES/ERP/WMS/MOM/etc.) Demonstrated ability to build relationships and trust with prospects/clients Industry 4.0 training/experience The Right Fit: We at Arcstone are extremely passionate about the product, the service we provide for our customers, and the transformation we are making in the manufacturing industry. We are looking for people who can bring that same level of passion and zeal to our mission! Show more Show less

About Us


Since its inception, Arcstone has successfully delivered solutions to 200+innovative manufacturing companies globally. We are committed to finding and developing the best talents that will propel Arcstone forward. Arcstone is a digital manufacturing solutions provider that helps run factory floors and interconnect them to the global manufacturing supply chain. We welcome enterprise software development experts, manufacturing engineering talents, exceptional business developers, and other various roles who are ideally from the manufacturing sector. If you are ready to join a fast-paced, rapidly-growing company in a field poised for disruption, we want you!


Job Description


At Arcstone you will have the opportunity to work on several key software solutions that serve as a backbone for factories within a quickly evolving manufacturing and supply-chain industry. Our products are all B2B, so you will be speaking directly with clients and working with them in order to help deploy a full-fledged manufacturing execution system together with a supply chain integrated platform. Understanding our customer’s factory processes together with their supply chain operations is key to be able to configure out toolsets to help our customers improve their productivity, efficiency, transparency, and sustainability.


What you’ll be doing:


  • Work directly with customers to set and deploy Arcstone's toolsets into their facilities
  • Perform testing and validation of deployed toolsets to ensure functionality and performance
  • Create advanced digital workflows, checklists, and dashboards to help digitalize manufacturing operations
  • Perform advanced API integration work to customer’s ERP/MES/MOM/etc. while coordinating security conditions with IT teams
  • Training customers on the usage of Arcstone toolsets and ensuring proper usage and validation of the data being collected
  • Integration with hardware & equipment on the factory floor


Requirements:


  • Proven track record of working with data ranging from collection, and analysis to integration work
  • Basic software development skillsets (VBA, JavaScript, Python, HTML, etc.)
  • Basic SQL, query experience on large datasets and using visualization toolsets (PowerBI/Tableau/Grafana/etc.)
  • Experience with hardware integration (OPC UA, MODBUS, MQTT, etc.)
  • Friendly and customer-centric attitude
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to tactfully influence, negotiate, and resolve conflicts
  • Comfort with ambiguity, uncertainty, and a dynamic business landscape
  • Self-motivated and driven to excel and deliver, able to handle stress with a positive attitude
  • Team player with no ego and a collaborative attitude
  • Open to travel (potentially globally!)


Good-to-have skills:


  • Previous manufacturing software usage experience (MES/ERP/WMS/MOM/etc.)
  • Demonstrated ability to build relationships and trust with prospects/clients
  • Industry 4.0 training/experience


The Right Fit:


We at Arcstone are extremely passionate about the product, the service we provide for our customers, and the transformation we are making in the manufacturing industry. We are looking for people who can bring that same level of passion and zeal to our mission!

job_description_formatted:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates.

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Chemistry, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.

Although every project is unique, you might typically:

  • Generate prompts that challenge AI.
  • Define comprehensive scoring criteria to evaluate the accuracy of the AI's answers.
  • Correct the model's responses based on your domain-specific knowledge

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You have a Master's Degree or PhD in Chemistry and 3 years of professional experience.
  • You have a Bachelor's Degree in Chemistry and 6+ years of professional experience.
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above.
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines.
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

job_description_formatted:
Building the Future of Crypto

Our Krakenites are a world-class team with crypto conviction, united by our desire to discover and unlock the potential of crypto and blockchain technology.

What makes us different?

Kraken is a mission-focused company rooted in crypto values. As a Krakenite, you’ll join us on our mission to accelerate the global adoption of crypto, so that everyone can achieve financial freedom and inclusion. For over a decade, Kraken’s focus on our mission and crypto ethos has attracted many of the most talented crypto experts in the world.

Before you apply, please read the Kraken Culture page to learn more about our internal culture, values, and mission. We also expect candidates to familiarize themselves with the Kraken app. Learn how to create a Kraken account here.

As a fully remote company, we have Krakenites in 70+ countries who speak over 50 languages. Krakenites are industry pioneers who develop premium crypto products for experienced traders, institutions, and newcomers to the space. Kraken is committed to industry-leading security, crypto education, and world-class client support through our products like Kraken Pro, Kraken NFT, and Kraken Futures.

Become a Krakenite and build the future of crypto!

Proof of work

The team

Join our Core Backend Engineering community as a Sr. Engineering Manager and have the opportunity to lead the ongoing transformation of the digital assets industry at Kraken. Our team plays a crucial role in developing the core systems that support the exchange.

As a Sr. Engineering Manager you will have the chance to lead and collaborate with highly skilled Rust Engineers from around the world. We are enthusiastic about open source projects and continuously strive to explore the potential of Rust. Our collaborative work environment allows us to stay ahead in the ever-changing crypto landscape.

The team has successfully completed the rewrite of core services from PHP to Rust, resulting in improved performance and security of our platform. By joining our team, you will have the opportunity to contribute towards shaping the future of digital assets at Kraken.

For this role we are looking to hire someone located in an APAC timezone.

The opportunity

  • Lead a team responsible for Kraken’s onboarding experience. This is a uniquely impactful role that has direct impact on the business with a high level of potential impact and influence
  • Mentor engineers in their personal and professional growth, offering both technical and career guidance
  • Oversee and contribute to engineering design discussions, ensuring high standards and innovative solutions
  • Collaborate cross-functionally with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to ensure alignment and successful project delivery
  • Maintain technical skills by contributing to the codebase, alongside managerial duties

Skills You Should HODL

  • An advanced degree in computer science or engineering discipline
  • 10+ years of software development experience, primarily focused on backend development
  • Experience with software architecture, designing APIs and event-driven systems
  • 8+ years leading engineering teams
  • 2+ years of experience managing remote teams
  • Looking to potentially grow into a director role
  • You are passionate about software engineering, improving processes, and driving change

Nice to haves

  • You are interested in cryptocurrency and open to the potential it has to positively transform our world
  • You keep a close watch on modern technologies and can program in Rust

#APAC

This job is accepting ongoing applications and there is no application deadline.

Please note, applicants are permitted to redact or remove information on their resume that identifies age, date of birth, or dates of attendance at or graduation from an educational institution.

We consider qualified applicants with criminal histories for employment on our team, assessing candidates in a manner consistent with the requirements of the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.

Kraken is powered by people from around the world and we celebrate all Krakenites for their diverse talents, backgrounds, contributions and unique perspectives. We hire strictly based on merit, meaning we seek out the candidates with the right abilities, knowledge, and skills considered the most suitable for the job. We encourage you to apply for roles where you don't fully meet the listed requirements, especially if you're passionate or knowledgable about crypto!

As an equal opportunity employer, we don’t tolerate discrimination or harassment of any kind. Whether that’s based on race, ethnicity, age, gender identity, citizenship, religion, sexual orientation, disability, pregnancy, veteran status or any other protected characteristic as outlined by federal, state or local laws.

Stay in the know

Follow us on Twitter

Learn on the Kraken Blog

Connect on LinkedIn

job_description_formatted:
Are you ready to be part of something big? We’re hiring for the Enterprise Solutions Engineer APAC (International Solutions Engineering Team) on our Sales Team!

In this role, you’ll engage with key decision-makers, forge impactful relationships with some of the world’s most influential organizations, and directly contribute to the growth of Semrush.

Why Semrush?

We are a global leader in online marketing technology, meeting market demand with rapid scaling. Don’t miss the chance to join our unstoppable momentum and make history with us!

Some highlights of our success include:

  • Semrush named a Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Search Engine Optimization Solutions, Q3 2025
  • $400M+ Annual Recurring Revenue
  • 118,000+ paying customers worldwide
  • 1M+ freemium users
  • Exceptional demand for our new Enterprise platform, with deals secured from global giants like P&G, Tesla, FedEx, Samsung, Amazon, and others.


If you're looking for a role where your impact will be visible and meaningful, we’d love to hear from you.

Tasks in the role

  • Be a thought leader to the sales team and a technical lead on strategic client relationships across various industry verticals.
  • Act as a trusted advisor to our customers, identifying and developing new business opportunities that align with their objectives.
  • Build and maintain strong strategic relationships with account teams, partners, and customers to support sales objectives.
  • Collaborate with sales teams to assess potential deals, determine customer needs, and identify the best approach for engagement.
  • Conduct deep-dive discussions and discoveries with prospects to uncover pain points and understand workflows, use cases and technical requirements
  • Deliver customized and engaging product demonstrations that illustrate the value of Semrush’s solutions, positioning them against competitors where needed, incorporating real-world examples and addressing customer-specific challenges.
  • Take ownership of the technical solution validation during the sales process by leading technical assessments, proof of concepts, objection handling, buyer enablement and more.
  • Provide authoritative guidance on technical concepts, with expertise in API, data handling, integrations, security, and processes.
  • Collaborate with Executives, Product, Sales, and other senior-level stakeholders to champion an environment for ongoing strategic customer success.
  • Ensure smooth transition from pre-sales to post-sales, providing insights and recommendations to customer success teams for ongoing success.
  • Establish a deep understanding of Semrush’s technology portfolio and its competitive landscape and analyze market trends to effectively position Semrush as the leading choice for customers.
  • Participate in non-deal related activities such as internal training, webinars, events, and collaborate with other Semrush teams on initiatives to drive customer success.


What we’re looking for

  • Native English speaker (second language preferred but not a must e.g. Mandarin, Japanese, Korean).
  • 4-7 years of experience in Technical Pre-Sales, Post-Sales, or Sales / Solutions Engineering within a SaaS company.
  • 2-3 years of experience in mid-market or enterprise sales, with a track record of closing complex deals > €250K ARR.
  • Proficiency in sales methodologies such as Sandler, Challenger, SPIN, MEDDPICC, etc.
  • Strong sense of ownership and experience leading the technical solution validation of a deal.
  • Exceptional collaboration skills and an organizational and structured approach.
  • Customer-first mindset with a passion for delivering exceptional customer experiences.
  • Strong communication skills, with the ability to interact confidently with clients.
  • Digital marketing knowledge (e.g. SEO, PPC, Content Marketing, Social, consumer behavior, etc.) highly preferred.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.
  • A Bachelor degree is preferred (e.g. engineering, business administration or similar field), or equivalent experience.


A Bit About The Team

The Sales team is at the forefront of empowering businesses to achieve online visibility and digital marketing success.

Through our One Semrush selling approach and world-class enablement programs, we equip our team with the tools, resources, and training needed to:

  • Exceed sales goals
  • Maximize earning potential
  • Deliver meaningful results for our clients


To learn more about our business and vision, explore the Semrush Analyst Day 2024 presentation from New York City.

What’s In It For You

  • Flexible working hours
  • Unlimited PTO
  • Flexi Benefit for your hobby
  • Employee Support Program
  • Loss of family member financial aid
  • Employee Resource Groups
  • Meals, snacks, and drinks at the office
  • Corporate events
  • Teambuilding
  • Training, courses, conferences
  • Gifts for employees


A Little More About Our Company

Semrush is a leading online visibility management SaaS platform that enables businesses globally to run search engine optimization, pay-per-click, content, social media and competitive research campaigns and get measurable results from online marketing.

We've been developing our product for 16 years and have been awarded G2's Top 100 Software Products, Global and US Search Awards 2021, Great Place to Work Certification, Deloitte Technology Fast 500 and many more. In March 2021 Semrush went public and started trading on the NYSE with the SEMR ticker.

10,000,000+ users in America, Europe, Asia, and Australia have already tried Semrush, and over 1,700 people around the world are working on its development. The Semrush team is constantly growing.

Our Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion commitments

Semrush is an equal opportunity employer. Building a better future for marketers around the world unites people from all backgrounds. Even if you feel that you don’t 100% match all requirements, don’t be discouraged to apply! We are committed to ensure that everyone feels a sense of belonging in the workplace.

We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, creed, color, national origin, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, ancestry, physical or mental disability, or medical condition including medical characteristics, genetic identity, marital status, military service, or any other classification protected by applicable local, state or federal laws.

Our new colleague, we are waiting for you!

Jane Megrian

Recruiter

evgeniia.megrian@semrush.com

job_summary: Greetings and thank you for visiting our job post. Supercoder is an AI-powered career development platform to connect developers around the world to remote job opportunities with competitive payment. Type of role : 100% Full-time remote About the Company - Greetings and thank you for visiting our job post. Supercoder is an AI-powered career development platform to connect developers around the world to remote job opportunities with competitive payment. About the Role - We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Middle QA Engineer to join our team. This role requires 3-5 years of experience in both manual and automation testing to ensure our products meet the highest quality standards. The ideal candidate should be proficient in writing test cases, executing test plans, identifying defects, and automating test scripts using tools like Appium. As a Middle QA Engineer, you will work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and business analysts, to improve testing efficiency and drive high-quality product releases. Responsibilities Test Case Design & Execution: Write, review, and execute comprehensive test cases based on business and technical requirements. Ensure test coverage across functional, regression, and exploratory testing. Automation Testing: Develop and maintain automation test scripts using Appium and other automation tools. Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines for faster feedback loops. Defect Tracking & Reporting: Identify, document, and track defects using bug-tracking tools (e.g., JIRA, Azure DevOps). Collaborate with developers to troubleshoot and resolve issues efficiently. Test Planning & Strategy: Contribute to test planning, estimation, and execution strategies. Assist in defining testing best practices and quality metrics. API & Performance Testing: Perform API testing using tools like Postman, RestAssured, or similar. Support performance testing efforts where applicable. Collaboration & Communication: Work closely with developers, product managers, and business analysts to clarify requirements and improve test coverage. Participate in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospective meetings. Continuous Improvement: Stay up to date with industry trends and advancements in test automation. Contribute to improving testing frameworks and overall QA processes. Qualifications 3-5 years of experience in software testing, including both manual and automation testing. Strong knowledge of test case design, test execution, and defect tracking. Hands-on experience with Appium (or other mobile automation tools). Familiarity with Selenium, WebDriver, or similar automation frameworks. Experience with test management tools like TestRail, Xray, or similar. Proficiency in API testing using tools like Postman or RestAssured. Knowledge of at least one programming language (e.g., Java, Python, JavaScript) for test automation. Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a team. Preferred Skills Experience with CI/CD pipelines and integrating automated tests. Exposure to performance testing using JMeter, Gatling, or similar tools. ISTQB or other relevant testing certifications. Why Join Us? Work in a collaborative and innovative environment. Get opportunities to grow your career in automation testing. Be part of a team that values quality, efficiency, and continuous improvement. Show more Show less

job_description_formatted:
Greetings and thank you for visiting our job post.


Supercoder is an AI-powered career development platform to connect developers around the world to remote job opportunities with competitive payment.


Type of role: 100% Full-time remote


About the Company - Greetings and thank you for visiting our job post. Supercoder is an AI-powered career development platform to connect developers around the world to remote job opportunities with competitive payment.


About the Role - We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Middle QA Engineer to join our team. This role requires 3-5 years of experience in both manual and automation testing to ensure our products meet the highest quality standards. The ideal candidate should be proficient in writing test cases, executing test plans, identifying defects, and automating test scripts using tools like Appium. As a Middle QA Engineer, you will work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and business analysts, to improve testing efficiency and drive high-quality product releases.



Responsibilities


Test Case Design & Execution:

  • Write, review, and execute comprehensive test cases based on business and technical requirements.
  • Ensure test coverage across functional, regression, and exploratory testing.

Automation Testing:

  • Develop and maintain automation test scripts using Appium and other automation tools.
  • Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines for faster feedback loops.

Defect Tracking & Reporting:

  • Identify, document, and track defects using bug-tracking tools (e.g., JIRA, Azure DevOps).
  • Collaborate with developers to troubleshoot and resolve issues efficiently.

Test Planning & Strategy:

  • Contribute to test planning, estimation, and execution strategies.
  • Assist in defining testing best practices and quality metrics.

API & Performance Testing:

  • Perform API testing using tools like Postman, RestAssured, or similar.
  • Support performance testing efforts where applicable.

Collaboration & Communication:

  • Work closely with developers, product managers, and business analysts to clarify requirements and improve test coverage.
  • Participate in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospective meetings.

Continuous Improvement:

  • Stay up to date with industry trends and advancements in test automation.
  • Contribute to improving testing frameworks and overall QA processes.


Qualifications

  • 3-5 years of experience in software testing, including both manual and automation testing.
  • Strong knowledge of test case design, test execution, and defect tracking.
  • Hands-on experience with Appium (or other mobile automation tools).
  • Familiarity with Selenium, WebDriver, or similar automation frameworks.
  • Experience with test management tools like TestRail, Xray, or similar.
  • Proficiency in API testing using tools like Postman or RestAssured.
  • Knowledge of at least one programming language (e.g., Java, Python, JavaScript) for test automation.
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a team.


Preferred Skills

  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines and integrating automated tests.
  • Exposure to performance testing using JMeter, Gatling, or similar tools.
  • ISTQB or other relevant testing certifications.


Why Join Us?

  • Work in a collaborative and innovative environment.
  • Get opportunities to grow your career in automation testing.
  • Be part of a team that values quality, efficiency, and continuous improvement.

job_description_formatted:
Business Developer/Sales



Responsibilities

1. Responsible for the sales and promotion of the company's products, achieving individual performance targets;

2. Actively develop local dealers, while maintaining, training, supporting, and establishing a KOL team within the region;

3. Participate in domestic and international exhibitions and have the ability to independently complete corresponding tasks, multi-visa holders are welcome;

4. Collect and analyze international market industry information, development trends, demand changes, and customer feedback data, and work with the team to complete sales tasks;

5. Accept and complete various temporary or routine tasks assigned by the company or superiors on time.


Requirements:

1. Bachelor’s degree

2. Fluent English

3. Strong communication and negotiation skills, high stress resistance and sense of responsibility, good professional ethics, and team spirit;

4. Familiar with foreign trade processes; passionate about sales, with strong self-learning abilities; 5. Skilled in independent development and operation of online networks and social media, with at least two years of experience as a foreign trade business supervisor in the same position

6. Medical/dental/oral industry sales experience are preferred

Location: Philippine, Manila:


Vacancy*1

Salary Range: USD 1500-3000/month plus performance bonus, negotiable

job_description_formatted:
A career at Tiffany inspires our people to dream and realise their dreams..

Tiffany & Co. is one of the world's most recognizable luxury jewelry brands. The Tiffany name has become synonymous with elegance, innovative design, fine craftsmanship and creative excellence with a reputation for the finest jewelry and effortless style. 

We have an exciting HR Executive opportunity is available within our Vietnam team.

This is a truly varied role where you will support all facets of Human Resources.

You will find yourself collaborating with a highly talented team on work that's challenging, engaging and incredibly rewarding. You will be trusted, empowered and supported to make a meaningful impact on the professional lives of Tiffany employees in Vietnam market. Here's your chance to use your knowledge, skills and experience to shine brightly and achieve your ambitions.

The Tiffany HR team are driven to make Tiffany a powerful force for good, for its people, clients, society and the environment. You will join this legacy.

Key Accountabilities

Reporting directly to the Director - Human Resources, Australia and New Zealand, this role will be responsible for providing administrative HR support to the HR team, management and employees.

HR Operations Coordination

Payroll

  • Prepare Monthly Payroll for approval working with external payroll provider and reporting to accounting
  • Ensure benefit claims are complaint and reimbursed according to benefit policy
  • Ensure compliance to statutory requirements, and process government claims, social security submission, taxes filing, employment passes processing etc
  • Work with Payroll Vendor to ensure accurate annual tax filing

Resourcing

  • Review that job requisitions are current and up to date to ensure accurate recruitment activity reporting
  • Ensure background checks via 3rd party are completed and satisfactory
  • Maintain immigration compliance, renewal of work pass and maintain accurate data, and reporting as necessary
  • Support on job requisition postings, resume screening, interview coordination

Employee Lifecycle

  • Retention and compliance of Employment files: new hire paperwork, letters, employment agreements, supporting documents for leave, and payroll processing. Ensure signed document retention and filing in a secure manner
  • Maintain accuracy of HR Systems data (HCM Oracle) to provide regular reporting to maintain organisation chart, payroll accuracy, referral payouts, people & talent metrics and accurate headcount and labor cost reporting vs plan.
  • Ensure office & retail new joiners onboarding is smooth and efficient and according to the roles and responsibilities for each stakeholder and employee against global and local processes
  • Maintain Organisation Charts, access to employee professional photos
  • Guide employees on how to maintain their own data to keep accurate records and information
  • Manage off-boarding of employees including exit clearances, tax filing for non-local employees etc.
  • Manage benefit enrolment and termination for all employees / dependents

Employee Relations

  • Execute and promote compliance of all Tiffany policies and procedures.
  • Support employee queries (e.g. annual leave, notice period, wellness etc) in a timely and responsive manner
  • Ensure Employees / Managers have access to letter templates, policy guidance, FAQ to self -serve.

Data Collection and Analysis

  • Complete Annual LVMH reporting or other requests for company reporting
  • Use multiple sources (HCM Oracle, exit interviews, onboarding survey, performance management, employee survey, etc.) to collect and analyze data including employee turnover, employee onboarding/exit data, compensation and performance.
  • Support in a timely manner in regular and adhoc requests by country HR Business Partners on data and reporting request for: PMP, Individual Compensation Review (ICR), Benefits Trends, Organisation & Management Review (OMR)

HR Projects

  • Provide support in key HR projects.

Administrative and Management Support Tasks

  • Manage ordering and inventory of office & pantry supplies, stationery, snacks, etc. and tracking and stock replenishment and office cleanliness
  • Support on the setting up IT equipment and access request for new hires
  • Managing the concur system and checking validity of expense claims for Retail Director
  • Coordinate travel arrangements for overseas travel
  • Support on the office maintenance and upkeep including being an ambassador of workplace health safety compliance.
  • Be the first aider person for office
  • Send staff to be First Aid certified
  • Receptionist related responsibilities (manage the door system, receiving visitors etc.)
  • Pull out monthly e-leave report for Key stakeholders.
  • Perform any ad-hoc duties as needed.

To Be Successful In This Role, You Will Have

  • Minimum of 2 years' full-time Human Resources administration/coordination experience.
  • Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or related discipline
  • Previous experience in HRIS data reporting/analysis and HR systems support (ideally Oracle HCM). Experience with complex data analysis and presentation, dashboards creations, system automation. Experience using SharePoint and similar tools is a must.
  • Strong computer skills with advanced MS Excel and Powerpoint
  • Strong customer-service orientation, ability to prioritise multiple initiatives and desire to deliver end to end solutions
  • A sense of humor! We like to have fun and see personalities shine!
  • Self-motivation to think outside the "blue" box and develop creative/innovative solutions.
  • Strong in English and Vietnamese
  • Optimistic, positive, collaborative, with an ability to relate to others and respond to their needs

If this sounds like you, this is a great opportunity to join a global luxury organization at an exciting year of growth.

Why Tiffany?

  • Generous salary, employee merchandise benefits and milestone gifts
  • High performing, caring, fun and dynamic HR team
  • Culture focused on wellbeing, innovation and growth
  • Endless career opportunities with the largest luxury group - LVMH!
  • Never-ending training and individual up-skilling opportunities
  • Great mentoring from highly experienced management team
  • Global opportunities for networking and cross-collaboration
  • Flexible working policy
  • Wellbeing and Charitable Giving/Volunteering Program

Blue Box. White Ribbon. That's a wrap.

job_description_formatted:
🌍 Business Development Specialist | Remote | High Commission | Global Expansion 🌍

Company Overview

At GlobiFYE, we’re revolutionizing global business expansion. Our innovative platform enables companies to scale internationally without the need for a physical presence, providing seamless operational and HR management for compliant and efficient global growth.

Why Join GlobiFYE?

✅ High Earning Potential – Earn 15–20% commission per closed deal (no cap!)

🌐 Global Flexibility – Fully remote role, set your own schedule

🚀 Professional Growth – Collaborate with an international team

🌟 Impactful Work – Help redefine how companies go global

Role: Business Development Specialist

As a key member of our sales team, you'll drive growth by identifying new business opportunities, building strong client relationships, and closing deals that empower businesses to scale internationally through GlobiFYE’s services.

Key Responsibilities

  • Identify and engage companies seeking global expansion solutions
  • Build and maintain long-term client relationships
  • Present and communicate GlobiFYE’s value proposition to prospects
  • Develop and execute strategic sales plans
  • Collaborate with internal teams to ensure smooth onboarding
  • Meet/exceed sales targets to maximize commission earnings

What We’re Looking For

✔️ 2–3+ years in business development, sales, or similar roles

✔️ Track record of closing deals and hitting revenue goals

✔️ Excellent communication, negotiation, and relationship-building skills

✔️ Self-starter with strong initiative and independence

➕ Bonus: Experience in IT services, SaaS, or international outsourcing

Compensation

💸 Commission-based: 15–20% per closed deal

📈 Unlimited earnings potential – the more you close, the more you earn!

Location

🏠 Remote – Work from anywhere with a stable internet connection

Company: GlobiFYE

Location: Remote (Vietnam)


Join GlobiFYE and empower companies to scale worldwide—smarter and faster.

job_description_formatted:
Mô tả công việc

Mô Tả Công Việc

  • Thực hiện nghiên cứu phát triển công thức mới cho các loại sản phẩm: nước có gas, nước không gas, trà thảo mộc, nước trái cây…
  • Tối ưu hóa công thức sản phẩm hiện có nhằm giảm giá thành, nâng cao chất lượng hoặc điều chỉnh theo yêu cầu thị trường
  • Chuẩn bị hồ sơ kỹ thuật, tài liệu hướng dẫn, định mức nguyên vật liệu sản phẩm
  • Phối hợp sản xuất thử nghiệm cùng bộ phận sản xuất, QA/QC
  • Theo dõi chất lượng sản phẩm thử nghiệm từ phòng lab đến dây chuyền thực tế
  • Nghiên cứu tính chất nguyên vật liệu, đánh giá nhà cung cấp mới (nếu cần)
  • Hỗ trợ cập nhật – chỉnh sửa tài liệu hệ thống chất lượng (ISO/HACCP) liên quan đến sản phẩm
  • Có thể đi khảo sát nhà máy sản xuất gia công (nếu có)

Yêu cầu công việc

Yêu cầu ứng viên

  • Tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng/Đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ thực phẩm, Hóa thực phẩm, Công nghệ sinh học, Hóa học…
  • Có ít nhất 06 tháng kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương trong ngành nước giải khát, thực phẩm, đồ uống
  • Hiểu nguyên lý hoạt động của thiết bị phòng lab (máy đo pH, máy chiết mẫu, cân vi lượng...)
  • Biết cách xây dựng công thức, đánh giá cảm quan và xử lý nguyên liệu thực tế
  • Sử dụng thành thạo Word, Excel, ưu tiên biết dùng phần mềm thiết kế bao bì là lợi thế
  • Có tư duy sáng tạo, phân tích – tổng hợp tốt, yêu thích đổi mới
  • Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm, giao tiếp tốt, phối hợp hiệu quả với các bộ phận
  • Có thể làm việc độc lập – chủ động trong dự án R&D

Tại sao bạn yêu thích làm việc tại đây

Quyền Lợi

  • Mức lương cạnh tranh theo năng lực và kinh nghiệm
  • Phụ cấp chuyên môn, phụ cấp công việc R&D, ăn trưa, xăng xe, điện thoại (nếu có)
  • Thưởng Lễ, Tết, cuối năm, thưởng sáng kiến cải tiến
  • Cơ hội tham gia dự án phát triển sản phẩm toàn quốc, được đào tạo kỹ thuật – công nghệ
  • Đóng đầy đủ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN và các chế độ khác theo Luật Lao động
  • Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, sáng tạo, đồng nghiệp thân thiện
  • Xe đưa rước hằng ngày từ TP.HCM đến Nhơn Trạch

job_description_formatted:
We're looking for a Data QA Engineer to join our data engineering team, with a focus on ensuring data accuracy, integrity, and reliability across Snowflake and AWS-based data platforms.

You'll work across cloud data lakes, pipelines, and platform components, validating transformations, verifying data flows, and contributing to automation frameworks. While this is a data-focused role, experience with automation tools like Playwright and scripting in Python will be valuable in driving quality across both data pipelines and the user-facing layers of data platforms.

Requirements

Key Responsibilities

  • Design and execute test cases to validate data pipelines and transformations in Snowflake and AWS Data Lake environments
  • Perform data validation, reconciliation, and integrity checks using SQL and custom scripts
  • Test Python-based ETL/ELT pipelines, ensuring accuracy, error handling, and performance
  • Implement and maintain automated testing frameworks, with a focus on Playwright for UI components (e.g., dashboards, data interfaces)
  • Collaborate with data engineers and platform teams to test infrastructure setup, configuration, and access control
  • Log and triage defects, and support teams through resolution and release
  • Contribute to QA strategies and test plans across the broader data and platform teams

What You Bring

  • Proven experience in data-focused QA roles, ideally working with cloud-based data ecosystems
  • Strong SQL skills for data analysis and validation across large datasets
  • Experience testing pipelines and scripting with Python
  • Familiarity with Snowflake, AWS Data Lake services (S3, Glue, Athena), or similar platforms
  • Working knowledge of test automation, including experience with Playwright or similar frameworks (e.g. Cypress, Selenium)
  • Solid understanding of both backend data workflows and front-end interfaces used to access and visualise data
  • Excellent attention to detail and a methodical approach to problem-solving

Nice to Have

  • Familiarity with data orchestration tools like Airflow or dbt
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines in a data engineering or QA context
  • Exposure to data governance, observability, or compliance requirements
  • Experience testing data APIs, dashboards, or analytics platforms

Benefits

What We Care About:

  • Comprehensive Health Insurance - prioritizing your well-being
  • Flexible working hours along with a generous holiday policy
  • Profit-sharing opportunities available for all team members
  • Annual company retreats, sports activities, and interest groups to encourage team bonding and enjoyment!
  • Training & Conferences - design your own personal development journey
  • Childcare support through vouchers to assist families
  • Most importantly, you will be part of a collaborative, politics-free team where everyone enjoys ownership and autonomy

Compensation

  • The maximum monthly gross salary for this position is 70 million VND. Final offers will be based on experience and alignment with the role's requirements

We take pride in nurturing an inclusive, streamlined, and self-managed work environment that promotes freedom, accountability, and ongoing feedback.

About Mindera:

At Mindera, we leverage technology to build products we take pride in, alongside a team we genuinely enjoy working with. Our expertise includes developing high-performance, resilient, and scalable software systems for renowned global brands. Our work culture is rooted in collaboration, innovation, and a commitment to continuous learning.

With offices located across Portugal, the UK, the USA, Australia, India, Romania, and Brazil, join us as we expand and influence the future of software engineering worldwide.

job_description_formatted:
Who We Are


Feazer (www.feazer.com) is an on-demand design services studio, providing businesses with high-quality creative solutions. We support various business on their digital, print, branding, presentation, illustration, web design, and motion design assets.


As we continue to grow, we are looking for a Senior Creative Designer to join our team. This is an exciting opportunity to hands-on to creative projects, mentor junior designers, and drive innovation in design workflows.


What You Will Do:

  • Manage and execute a variety of design assignments (Digital, Print, Presentation, Branding, and Web UI is a plus)
  • Mentor and provide guidance to junior designers, fostering a culture of creativity and skill growth.
  • Collaborate with the team to develop effective design solutions across multiple industries.
  • Integrate AI tools into design workflows, enhancing efficiency and creative output.
  • Conduct training sessions and skill development initiatives for the design team.
  • Ensure all designs meet industry standards, brand guidelines, and project-specific requirements.


Experience & Qualifications:

  • Extensive experience (more than 5 years) in graphic design, branding, or art direction, with a proven ability to execute high-level creative projects.
  • Strong portfolio demonstrating creative excellence across multiple platforms.
  • Experience mentoring and guiding junior designers, with a passion for developing creative talent.
  • Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design or equivalent experience in a related field.


Required Skills:

  • Advanced proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, and AI-powered design tools, leveraging technology for efficiency and innovation.
  • Deep understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and branding, with the ability to create compelling layouts and design systems.
  • Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple creative projects while maintaining quality and consistency.
  • Excellent communication and problem-solving skills, ensuring clear collaboration with internal teams and clients.
  • Resilient and adaptable in a fast-paced environment, able to handle feedback and evolving project priorities with a positive mindset.
  • Fluent in English (both written and spoken).


Benefits:

  • International Exposure: Work with global clients across various industries.
  • Skill Development: Expand your expertise across different design disciplines.
  • Flexible Work Environment: We are a remote-first company!


Preferred Start Date: As soon as possible

Contract Type: Permanent


Join us and be part of a fast-growing company shaping the future of design! Learn more about Feazer at www.feazer.com


We look forward to receiving your application! 😊

job_description_formatted:
Stellarbase is a boutique digital studio specializing in e-commerce solutions, helping ambitious brands build, grow, and optimize their online presence through custom development, seamless integrations, and experiences designed to turn visitors into loyal customers.


Your Role

You’ll be responsible for building and improving e-commerce solutions for our clients. This includes writing clean code, setting up integrations and apps, and ensuring everything runs smoothly. This is a 6-month contract role, with the potential to convert to a full-time position if we’re a good fit for each other.


What You'll Do:

  • Write clean and maintainable code using Liquid, HTML, Javascript, React, Tailwind, etc
  • Translate client needs into technical requirements and actionable tasks
  • Collaborate with clients to ensure alignment on project goals, timelines, and deliverables


What You'll Bring:

  • Strong experience with HTML, JavaScript, CSS and React/Next.js
  • Familiarity with modern development tools and frameworks (e.g., TypeScript, GraphQL, etc)
  • Proven experience with RESTful API design and integration
  • Experience or familiarity with e-commerce platforms like Shopify, BigCommerce, etc
  • Professional proficiency in English, with strong communication and interpersonal skills
  • Proactivity, self-organization, and ability to take initiative independently


What You’ll Get:

  • Remote-first culture
  • Flexible working hours

N·∫øu b·∫°n ƒëam m√™ ti·∫øp th·ªã v√† ng√†nh Forex v√† ƒë√°p ·ª©ng c√°c y√™u c·∫ßu tr√™n, ch√∫ng t√¥i r·∫•t mong nh·∫≠n ƒë∆∞·ª£c h·ªì s∆° c·ªßa b·∫°n! ·ª®ng tuy·ªÉn ngay b·∫±ng c√°ch g·ª≠i CV v√† portfolio c·ªßa b·∫°n. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Job Title: Marketing Manager (Forex) - English & Vietnamese Speaker Location: Remote / Vietnam (Preferred) Job Type: Full-time About Us: We are a dynamic and rapidly growing Forex company looking for an experienced Marketing Manager to drive our brand's visibility, customer engagement, and lead generation through social media and online platforms. If you are passionate about financial markets, have a strong marketing background, and are fluent in both English and Vietnamese, we want you on our team! Responsibilities: Develop and execute content marketing strategies for social media platforms, including Instagram, X , TikTok, and others. Create engaging and informative content in Vietnamese (with occasional English content) to attract and retain customers. Actively engage with online communities, forums, and groups to promote the company and drive traffic. Monitor and analyze social media trends, performance metrics, and audience insights to optimize marketing campaigns. Conduct outreach campaigns and collaborate with influencers and industry-related content creators. Participate in English meetings twice a week to discuss marketing performance and strategies. Requirements: Proven experience in digital marketing, social media management, or content creation, preferably in the Forex or financial industry. Strong writing and speaking skills in both Vietnamese and English. Experience in social media advertising, influencer marketing, and community engagement. Ability to analyze performance data and generate actionable insights. Excellent communication and reporting skills. Self-motivated, creative, and able to work independently. Benefits: Competitive salary based on experience. Opportunity to work remotely with a global team. Career growth in the financial and Forex industry. Performance-based bonuses and incentives. If you are passionate about marketing and the Forex industry, and you meet the qualifications, we‚Äôd love to hear from you! Apply now by sending your CV and portfolio. Show more Show less
job_description_formatted:
Tiêu đề công việc: Quản lý Tiếp thị (Forex) - Thông thạo Tiếng Anh & Tiếng Việt


Địa điểm: Làm việc từ xa / Việt Nam (Ưu tiên)


Loại công việc: Toàn thời gian


Giới thiệu về chúng tôi: Chúng tôi là một công ty Forex năng động và đang phát triển nhanh chóng, tìm kiếm một Quản lý Tiếp thị giàu kinh nghiệm để nâng cao nhận diện thương hiệu, thu hút khách hàng và thúc đẩy tăng trưởng thông qua các nền tảng trực tuyến. Nếu bạn đam mê thị trường tài chính, có nền tảng tiếp thị vững chắc và thông thạo cả Tiếng Anh lẫn Tiếng Việt, chúng tôi muốn bạn tham gia đội ngũ của mình!


Trách nhiệm:


  • Xây dựng và triển khai chiến lược nội dung tiếp thị trên các nền tảng mạng xã hội như Instagram, X , TikTok và các kênh khác.
  • Sáng tạo nội dung hấp dẫn và giàu thông tin bằng Tiếng Việt (thỉnh thoảng bằng Tiếng Anh) để thu hút và giữ chân khách hàng.
  • Tích cực tham gia vào các cộng đồng trực tuyến, diễn đàn và nhóm để quảng bá công ty và thu hút lưu lượng truy cập.
  • Giám sát và phân tích xu hướng truyền thông xã hội, đo lường hiệu suất và tìm hiểu khách hàng để tối ưu hóa chiến dịch tiếp thị.
  • Thực hiện các chiến dịch tiếp cận và hợp tác với các nhà sáng tạo nội dung và influencer trong ngành.
  • Chuẩn bị và trình bày báo cáo hàng tuần cho nhóm tiếp thị về hiệu suất chiến dịch, các chỉ số quan trọng và chiến lược sắp tới.
  • Tham gia cuộc họp bằng Tiếng Anh hai lần mỗi tuần để thảo luận về hiệu suất tiếp thị.


Yêu cầu:

  • Kinh nghiệm đã được chứng minh trong lĩnh vực tiếp thị số, quản lý mạng xã hội hoặc sáng tạo nội dung, ưu tiên trong ngành Forex hoặc tài chính.
  • Kỹ năng viết xuất sắc bằng Tiếng Việt và Tiếng Anh.
  • Kinh nghiệm trong quảng cáo trên mạng xã hội, tiếp thị influencer và phát triển cộng đồng.
  • Khả năng phân tích dữ liệu hiệu suất và tạo ra các chiến lược hành động.
  • Kỹ năng giao tiếp và báo cáo xuất sắc.
  • Chủ động, sáng tạo và có khả năng làm việc độc lập.


Quyền lợi:

  • Mức lương cạnh tranh dựa trên kinh nghiệm.
  • Cơ hội làm việc từ xa với đội ngũ toàn cầu.
  • Phát triển sự nghiệp trong ngành tài chính và Forex.
  • Thưởng và đãi ngộ dựa trên hiệu suất.

Nếu bạn đam mê tiếp thị và ngành Forex và đáp ứng các yêu cầu trên, chúng tôi rất mong nhận được hồ sơ của bạn! Ứng tuyển ngay bằng cách gửi CV và portfolio của bạn.
