Job Title: Marketing Manager (Forex) - English & Vietnamese Speaker


Location: Remote / Vietnam (Preferred)


Job Type: Full-time


About Us: We are a dynamic and rapidly growing Forex company looking for an experienced Marketing Manager to drive our brand's visibility, customer engagement, and lead generation through social media and online platforms. If you are passionate about financial markets, have a strong marketing background, and are fluent in both English and Vietnamese, we want you on our team!


Responsibilities:


  • Develop and execute content marketing strategies for social media platforms, including Instagram, X , TikTok, and others.
  • Create engaging and informative content in Vietnamese (with occasional English content) to attract and retain customers.
  • Actively engage with online communities, forums, and groups to promote the company and drive traffic.
  • Monitor and analyze social media trends, performance metrics, and audience insights to optimize marketing campaigns.
  • Conduct outreach campaigns and collaborate with influencers and industry-related content creators.
  • Prepare and present weekly reports to the marketing team, highlighting campaign performance, key insights, and future strategies.
  • Participate in English meetings twice a week to discuss marketing performance and strategies.


Requirements:

  • Proven experience in digital marketing, social media management, or content creation, preferably in the Forex or financial industry.
  • Strong writing and speaking skills in both Vietnamese and English.
  • Experience in social media advertising, influencer marketing, and community engagement.
  • Ability to analyze performance data and generate actionable insights.
  • Excellent communication and reporting skills.
  • Self-motivated, creative, and able to work independently.


Benefits:

  • Competitive salary based on experience.
  • Opportunity to work remotely with a global team.
  • Career growth in the financial and Forex industry.
  • Performance-based bonuses and incentives.

If you are passionate about marketing and the Forex industry, and you meet the qualifications, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now by sending your CV and portfolio.

job_description_formatted:
Job Description

Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?

Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It With Pride.

You lead a field sales representative team to ensure delivery of the sales strategy and achievement of annual KPIs and targets for a particular area. You work closely with cross-functional colleagues to deliver on activation and reporting against KPIs.

How You Will Contribute

You will:

  • Manage, develop and motivate the team and work closely with the sales capability team to ensure delivery of training to the team.
  • Create and manage an annual business unit plan to deliver agreed channel revenue KPI’s and targets and provide reporting as required.
  • Manage winning customer business relationships that facilitate “best in industry” execution of our categories.
  • Work closely with key stakeholders including the account team, category, activation team, sales capability and customer finance to provide the optimum return across your area.
  • Fully understand category and insights knowledge, coaching the team in the use of category tools to engage and influence customers to make informed decisions that will grow our categories and deliver our annual plan.


What You Will Bring

A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career and the following experience and knowledge:

  • Knowledge of market and routes-to-market in which Mondelēz International performs
  • Experience in sales
  • Strong organizational and analytical skills
  • Excellent communication and interacting skills
  • Solid knowledge about sales and negotiation processes
  • Perseverance and attention to details


More About This Role

What you need to know about this position:

What extra ingredients you will bring:

Education / Certifications:

Job specific requirements:

Travel requirements:

Work schedule:

Number of Openings Available

0

No Relocation support available

Business Unit Summary

Headquartered in Singapore, Mondelēz International’s Asia, Middle East and Africa (AMEA) region is comprised of six business units, has more than 21,000 employees and operates in more than 27 countries including Australia, China, Indonesia, Ghana, India, Japan, Malaysia, New Zealand, Nigeria, Philippines, Saudi Arabia, South Africa, Thailand, United Arab Emirates and Vietnam. Seventy-six nationalities work across a network of more than 35 manufacturing plants, three global research and development technical centers and in offices stretching from Auckland, New Zealand to Casablanca, Morocco. Mondelēz International in the AMEA region is the proud maker of global and local iconic brands such as Oreo and belVita biscuits, Kinh Do mooncakes, Cadbury, Cadbury Dairy Milk and Milka chocolate, Halls candy, Stride gum, Tang powdered beverage and Philadelphia cheese. We are also proud to be named a Top Employer in many of our markets.

Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Job Type

Regular

Field Sales

POSITION OVERVIEW

We are looking for a proactive and results-driven Sales Representative to join our team. This role is ideal for someone with strong communication skills, experience in sales, and proficiency in both English and Spanish. The Sales Representative will collaborate closely with the prospect team to contribute to various initiatives focused on promoting our services and generating new leads.


As we work toward our ambitious goal of managing a billion-dollar in assets, we’re looking for someone who shares the same growth mindset—ambitious, responsible, and ready to grow with us. We want team members who are not just looking for a job, but for a long-term journey.


COMPENSATION: Base salary + Commission


WORKING HOURS

This is a full-time position, requiring 40 hours per week, as follows:

  • Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM (Chicago Time) and,
  • Saturday: 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM (Chicago Time)

Zoom meetings required during working hours.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Make inbound and outbound calls to prospective tenants and provide detailed information about available apartments.
  • Schedule apartment viewing tours. Communicate with customers primarily via phone calls (80%), as well as through text messages (15%) and emails (5%).
  • Assist customers in completing rental application forms.


QUALIFICATIONS

  • Bachelor’s degree in marketing, sales, business administration, or a related field preferred.
  • Minimum of 2-3 years in a sales field, preferably with a background in property management, real estate, airbnb, hospitality, etc.
  • Strong communication skills, with fluency in both English and Spanish
  • Having experience with working remotely as a plus
  • Proactive and eager to learn


BENEFITS

  • Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
  • 16 Paid Time Off (PTO) per year
  • Floating Holidays.
  • Commission/ Bonus/ KPI scheme
  • Annual salary review
  • Supportive and collaborative work environment.

We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI. What We Do The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe. About The Role GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Auto Engineer, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects. Although every project is unique, you might typically: Generate prompts that challenge AI. Define comprehensive scoring criteria to evaluate the accuracy of the AI's answers. Correct the model's responses based on your domain-specific knowledge. How To Get Started Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone. Requirements You have a Bachelor, PhD, Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering You have at least 3 years of professional experience in Auto Engineering Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge Benefits Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you? Get paid for your expertise, with rates that can go up to $40/hour depending on your skills, experience, and project needs Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise Show more Show less
job_description_formatted:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates.

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Auto Engineer, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.

Although every project is unique, you might typically:

  • Generate prompts that challenge AI.
  • Define comprehensive scoring criteria to evaluate the accuracy of the AI's answers.
  • Correct the model's responses based on your domain-specific knowledge.

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You have a Bachelor, PhD, Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering
  • You have at least 3 years of professional experience in Auto Engineering
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Get paid for your expertise, with rates that can go up to $40/hour depending on your skills, experience, and project needs
  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

job_summary: In November 2024, Printful and Printify came together as two equals and merged to form a global on-demand powerhouse. This role will involve working across our two platforms and brands, a unique and special challenge. To learn more about the merger, check out our blog post. About Us Both Printify and Printful are pioneering production on-demand companies and platforms established in Latvia but with a global customer base. Printify is bringing the dream of financial freedom and business ownership to the world by connecting e-commerce entrepreneurs with over 100 print-on-demand facilities around the globe. Printful has built world-class in-house production facilities and helps people to build their brands, empowering thousands of businesses‚Äîincluding iconic names like Coca-Cola and MTV. About the role We're looking for a driven Merchant Success Manager to join our dynamic Sales team. In this role, you'll be identifying, engaging, and converting potential customers into thriving Printify merchants. You'll build strong relationships, understand their business needs, and demonstrate how Printify can be the solution to their e-commerce goals. Your focus will be on proactive outreach, presenting compelling solutions, and closing deals to expand our merchant base. Responsibilities Drive customer acquisition by converting leads into active, paying Printify merchants. Present, promote, and sell Printify products and services using strong arguments to prospective customers. Develop and maintain a robust pipeline of new business opportunities. Understand prospective merchants' business models and challenges, and articulate how Printify can provide value. Negotiate and close sales agreements to achieve and exceed sales targets. Analyze sales data and market trends to identify opportunities and optimize sales strategies. Collaborate with the Merchant Success team to ensure a smooth handover and successful onboarding of new merchants. Stay informed about e-commerce trends, industry best practices, and competitor activities to effectively position Printify. Participate in activities that increase Printify‚Äôs presence amongst Vietnamese merchants. Requirements 2+ years of proven experience in Sales, Business Development, or a similar role focused on new customer acquisition. Demonstrated track record of consistently meeting or exceeding sales targets. Passion for technology and e-commerce. Experience in the software and/or technology industry, and/or Print on Demand industry is a plus. Experience using analytics and business intelligence tools such as Looker or Power BI. Ability to build effective data dashboards to monitor and improve KPIs is essential. Experience with CRM software is required. Fluent written and spoken English and Vietnamese proficiency. Technical aptitude to quickly learn new technologies and explain them to potential clients. A highly motivated, goal-oriented team player with strong negotiation and communication skills. Someone who is resilient, persistent, and able to handle objections effectively to close sales. Living in Vietnam. job_function: Sales, Business Development, and General Business
job_industries: Software Development, Printing Services, and Online and Mail Order Retail
job_description_formatted:
In November 2024, Printful and Printify came together as two equals and merged to form a global on-demand powerhouse. This role will involve working across our two platforms and brands, a unique and special challenge. To learn more about the merger, check out our blog post.


About Us

Both Printify and Printful are pioneering production on-demand companies and platforms established in Latvia but with a global customer base.

Printify is bringing the dream of financial freedom and business ownership to the world by connecting e-commerce entrepreneurs with over 100 print-on-demand facilities around the globe.

Printful has built world-class in-house production facilities and helps people to build their brands, empowering thousands of businesses—including iconic names like Coca-Cola and MTV.


About the role

We're looking for a driven Merchant Success Manager to join our dynamic Sales team. In this role, you'll be identifying, engaging, and converting potential customers into thriving Printify merchants. You'll build strong relationships, understand their business needs, and demonstrate how Printify can be the solution to their e-commerce goals. Your focus will be on proactive outreach, presenting compelling solutions, and closing deals to expand our merchant base.


Responsibilities

  • Drive customer acquisition by converting leads into active, paying Printify merchants.
  • Present, promote, and sell Printify products and services using strong arguments to prospective customers.
  • Develop and maintain a robust pipeline of new business opportunities.
  • Understand prospective merchants' business models and challenges, and articulate how Printify can provide value.
  • Negotiate and close sales agreements to achieve and exceed sales targets.
  • Analyze sales data and market trends to identify opportunities and optimize sales strategies.
  • Collaborate with the Merchant Success team to ensure a smooth handover and successful onboarding of new merchants.
  • Stay informed about e-commerce trends, industry best practices, and competitor activities to effectively position Printify.
  • Participate in activities that increase Printify’s presence amongst Vietnamese merchants.


Requirements

  • 2+ years of proven experience in Sales, Business Development, or a similar role focused on new customer acquisition.
  • Demonstrated track record of consistently meeting or exceeding sales targets.
  • Passion for technology and e-commerce.
  • Experience in the software and/or technology industry, and/or Print on Demand industry is a plus.
  • Experience using analytics and business intelligence tools such as Looker or Power BI. Ability to build effective data dashboards to monitor and improve KPIs is essential.
  • Experience with CRM software is required.
  • Fluent written and spoken English and Vietnamese proficiency.
  • Technical aptitude to quickly learn new technologies and explain them to potential clients.
  • A highly motivated, goal-oriented team player with strong negotiation and communication skills.
  • Someone who is resilient, persistent, and able to handle objections effectively to close sales.
  • Living in Vietnam.


What we offer

  • All the resources and tools to perform your tasks (choose between Mac or Windows).
  • Flexible working hours (start your day as late as 11 a.m.).
  • Health insurance, including a mental wellness program.
  • Room for professional growth (conferences, workshops, mentoring, guest lectures).
  • Exciting team-building events and parties you’ll never forget!


We are an equal opportunity workplace. We’re committed to diversity and inclusion and make our hiring decisions based solely on qualifications, merit, and work experience.


Interested, but don’t think this is the right fit for you? Feel free to share it with friends and check out other open positions at our career's site. We’re always looking for creative and driven minds to join our ever-growing team.


If you think you’d excel in this role, send us your resume in English, showing us why you are the right person for the job.

job_summary: As your premier Web3 talent acquisition partner, Hyphen Connect is dedicated to driving innovation by connecting passionate talent with forward-thinking enterprises. We equip both with the essential knowledge and tools needed to excel in the rapidly evolving, decentralized landscape. We serve as the link to top Web3 opportunities across infrastructure, DeFi, NFTs, gaming, and more, providing unparalleled insights, data-driven research, and comprehensive resources. We are seeking a Recruiter - Emerging Technology with a strong background in recruitment, and a keen interest in the Web3 and Emerging Technology industry. As a Recruiter, you will be responsible for sourcing, attracting, and hiring top talent across multiple functions within the company. If you are passionate and enthusiastic about the web3 industry, specifically talent related projects, come and join our team! In This Role, You Will Manage end-to-end recruitment process from job requisition through to offer negotiation and on-boarding for various roles within the organization, including specialized roles in AI, Robotics, and Quantum Computing. Build and maintain talent pipelines by proactively sourcing and engaging with passive candidates through online platforms, social media, professional networks, and other channels. Collaborate closely with hiring managers to understand recruitment needs, provide market insights, and ensure alignment on candidate profiles, job descriptions, and hiring timelines. Utilize applicant tracking systems (ATS) and other recruitment tools to track candidate progress, maintain candidate databases, and generate reports on pipeline activity. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, Web3 industry/ Emerging Technology developments, and talent acquisition best practices to help inform recruitment strategies and decision-making. You Might Thrive In This Role If You Have Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field 3+ years of experience in talent acquisition, preferably with experience working in a recruitment agency. Experience in recruiting for emerging technology sectors (e.g., AI, Robotics, Quantum Computing) Familiarity with emerging technology sectors, including developments and trends. Strong knowledge of applicant tracking systems (ATS) and recruitment platforms is an advantage. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively engage and build relationships with candidates and stakeholders. Exceptional organizational and coordination abilities to assist in managing recruitment projects and meet deadlines. Show more Show less

As your premier Web3 talent acquisition partner, Hyphen Connect is dedicated to driving innovation by connecting passionate talent with forward-thinking enterprises. We equip both with the essential knowledge and tools needed to excel in the rapidly evolving, decentralized landscape.

We serve as the link to top Web3 opportunities across infrastructure, DeFi, NFTs, gaming, and more, providing unparalleled insights, data-driven research, and comprehensive resources.

We are seeking a Recruiter - Emerging Technology with a strong background in recruitment, and a keen interest in the Web3 and Emerging Technology industry. As a Recruiter, you will be responsible for sourcing, attracting, and hiring top talent across multiple functions within the company.

If you are passionate and enthusiastic about the web3 industry, specifically talent related projects, come and join our team!

In This Role, You Will

  • Manage end-to-end recruitment process from job requisition through to offer negotiation and on-boarding for various roles within the organization, including specialized roles in AI, Robotics, and Quantum Computing.

job_summary: Wati is a Series B, fast growing SaaS platform that is revolutionizing how companies communicate with their customers. Through our cutting-edge customer engagement software built on Whatsapp's Business API, businesses are now able to have personalised conversations, be easily accessible and engage with their customers in-real time - at scale! We live in the on-demand economy, where customers expect fast, simple and easy service and that's exactly what our platform empowers companies to do. This is made possible through Wati's easy-to-use platform that can be up and running in no time. As a result, small and medium businesses have embraced the platform rapidly, and thousands of customers across 100+ countries are now using Wati. Wati is experiencing rapid growth and we are looking to hire seasoned Product Managers to help scale the product, prioritise ideas and work with our product and engineering teams to develop and execute our shared product vision. job_summary: Are you an engineering expert eager to shape the future of AI? Large‚Äëscale language models are evolving from clever chatbots into powerful engines of scientific discovery. With high‚Äëquality training data, tomorrow‚Äôs AI can democratize world‚Äëclass education, keep pace with cutting‚Äëedge research, and streamline engineering design and analysis for professionals everywhere. That training data begins with you‚Äîwe need your expertise to help power the next generation of AI. We‚Äôre looking for engineering specialists who live and breathe mechanical engineering, civil engineering, electrical engineering, aerospace engineering, chemical engineering, software engineering, industrial engineering, systems engineering, structural engineering, and materials science. You‚Äôll challenge advanced language models on topics like thermodynamics, fluid dynamics, structural integrity, control systems, robotics, circuit design, heat transfer, material properties, process optimization, and engineering simulations‚Äîdocumenting every failure mode so we can harden model reasoning. On a typical day, you will converse with the model on real-world engineering scenarios, verify factual accuracy and logical soundness, capture reproducible error traces, and suggest improvements to our prompt engineering and evaluation metrics. A master‚Äôs or PhD in engineering or a closely related engineering field is ideal; peer‚Äëreviewed publications, industry experience, or hands-on engineering projects signal fit. Clear, metacognitive communication‚Äî‚Äúshowing your work‚Äù‚Äîis essential. Ready to turn your engineering expertise into the knowledge base for tomorrow‚Äôs AI? Apply today and start teaching the model that will teach the world. We offer a pay range of $8-to- $65 per hour, with the exact rate determined after evaluating your experience, expertise, and geographic location. job_description_formatted:
Are you an engineering expert eager to shape the future of AI? Large‑scale language models are evolving from clever chatbots into powerful engines of scientific discovery. With high‑quality training data, tomorrow’s AI can democratize world‑class education, keep pace with cutting‑edge research, and streamline engineering design and analysis for professionals everywhere. That training data begins with you—we need your expertise to help power the next generation of AI.

We’re looking for engineering specialists who live and breathe mechanical engineering, civil engineering, electrical engineering, aerospace engineering, chemical engineering, software engineering, industrial engineering, systems engineering, structural engineering, and materials science. You’ll challenge advanced language models on topics like thermodynamics, fluid dynamics, structural integrity, control systems, robotics, circuit design, heat transfer, material properties, process optimization, and engineering simulations—documenting every failure mode so we can harden model reasoning.

On a typical day, you will converse with the model on real-world engineering scenarios, verify factual accuracy and logical soundness, capture reproducible error traces, and suggest improvements to our prompt engineering and evaluation metrics.

A master’s or PhD in engineering or a closely related engineering field is ideal; peer‑reviewed publications, industry experience, or hands-on engineering projects signal fit. Clear, metacognitive communication—“showing your work”—is essential.

Ready to turn your engineering expertise into the knowledge base for tomorrow’s AI? Apply today and start teaching the model that will teach the world.

We offer a pay range of $8-to- $65 per hour, with the exact rate determined after evaluating your experience, expertise, and geographic location. Final offer amounts may vary from the pay range listed above. As a contractor, you’ll supply a secure computer and high‑speed internet; company‑sponsored benefits such as health insurance and PTO do not apply.

Job title: Engineering Science Specialist – AI Trainer

Employment type: Contract

Workplace type: Remote

Seniority level: Mid‑Senior Level

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

Generative AI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills.

Although every project is unique, you might typically:

  • Content Creation & Refinement: Create and refine content to ensure accuracy and relevance across a variety of topics in Mathematics, while also developing references and examples of tasks.
  • Experts Acquisition: Assess the qualification tests of experts, ensuring their competency.
  • Chat Moderation: Provide support by addressing project-related questions from other experts in Discord chats, especially those related to project guidelines.
  • Auditing Work: Review and evaluate tasks completed by other experts, ensuring they align with project guidelines. Provide constructive feedback, verify expertise-related information, and edit content as necessary to improve quality.

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You have a Master's degree in Mathematics
  • You have at least 5 years of professional experience.
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
  • Experience in Generative AI/Prompt engineering/Reviewing
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines.
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

job_description_formatted:
Simpalm is hiring a Design Engineer for one of their direct clients in the USA, specializing in POP (Point-of-Purchase) display design. This role requires hands-on experience with SolidWorks, manufacturing-ready drawing creation, and working knowledge of plastic, metal, and wood fabrication processes. 


NOTE: Please don't apply if you don't have experience in designing POP displays or retail fixtures.

 

Key Responsibilities:

  • Translate design concepts and client requirements into detailed, manufacturable engineering solutions.
  • Develop comprehensive drawing packs and BOMs for prototype and production phases.
  • Design for manufacturability using materials such as plastic, metal, and wood—considering cost, safety, assembly, and usability.
  • Collaborate with production and project teams to meet design intent, quality standards, and delivery timelines.
  • Support prototype build-outs and inspections with DPM/PPM teams; ensure quality and functional requirements are met.
  • Visit factories as needed to review construction methods, verify specifications, and conduct quality checks.
  • Ensure all technical documentation complies with company standards and project specifications.

 

 

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Product Design, Mechanical Engineering, or a related field.
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in the POP display design industry.
  • Proven experience with manufacturing processes, including
  • Plastics: Sheet fabrication, vacuum forming, injection molding, extrusions
  • Metals: Sheet metal, wire forming, tube bending, and finishing
  • Wood: Fabrication, hardware integration, and finishing
  • Proficient in SolidWorks, including drawing packs and BOM creation.
  • Knowledge of SolidWorks EPDM is a plus.
  • Experience with Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop).
  • Familiarity with 3D rendering tools such as StudioMax or Cinema4D.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and strong attention to detail.
  • Strong interpersonal skills: able to work effectively in a team environment and interact with diverse stakeholders.

job_description_formatted:
We are looking for an experienced Senior SAP SD Consultant with a strong background in SAP AFS and EDI implementations to support our wholesale initiatives across Europe and Emerging Markets (EM). As a consultant, you will collaborate closely with our teams in India and Australia, driving high-impact SAP SD solutions.

 

Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with customers and stakeholders to gather requirements, configure SAP SD solutions and lead development and testing of complex SD/EDI integrations
  • Design and execute EDI setups for multiple regional customers, ensuring robust and reliable connectivity
  • Configure SAP SD solutions, including sales order types, delivery types, billing processes, and output management, tailored to specific business needs
  • Ensure seamless integration of SAP SD flows, from sales orders to delivery and billing, for EDI-enabled customers, with knowledge in SAP ECC and S/4HANA systems
  • Drive SAP integrations using APIs, IDocs and advanced technical tools, leveraging SAP technical skills such as ABAP debugging for customization and troubleshooting
  • Define field mappings, develop detailed technical specifications, and oversee end-to-end testing of SAP/EDI processes with external customers
  • Configure SAP systems to meet unique business requirements and ensure smooth functionality in complex implementations

 

Requirements

  • A minimum of 5 years of experience in SAP SD 7+ (AFS is an advantage)
  • Demonstrable strong experience with EDI integrations
  • Comfortable working in a distributed team setup
  • Strong experience working directly with external customers, IT/EDI teams and stakeholders
  • Ability to clearly communicate technical solutions and business process impacts to non-technical audiences
  • Confidence in conducting meetings, defining templates and managing customer expectations
  • Exceptional problem-solving skills with the ability to lead challenging implementations and resolve customer process discrepancies

 

We offer

  • By choosing EPAM Vietnam, you're getting a job at a Vietnam Best Workplace™ certified company (2022-23 and 2023-24)
  • You'll work with the latest and most advanced technologies on exciting global projects with a supportive multicultural team where your voice matters
  • We prioritize a healthy work-life balance with a flexible hybrid working model and generous annual leave of up to 19 days
  • We offer a transparent career path and an individual roadmap to engineer your future & accelerate your journey
  • At EPAM, you can find vast opportunities for self-development: access to over 25,000 online courses and libraries from industry leaders, English classes, mentoring programs, partial grants of certification, and experience exchange with colleagues around the world. You will learn, contribute, and grow with us

 

Life at EPAM

  • EPAM Systems, Inc. (EPAM) is a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company. Since 1993, we have used our software engineering expertise to become a leading global provider of digital engineering, cloud and AI-enabled transformation services, and a leading business and experience consulting partner for global enterprises and ambitious startups. We address our clients’ transformation challenges by fusing EPAM Continuum’s integrated strategy, experience and technology consulting with our 30+ years of engineering execution to speed our clients’ time to market and drive greater value from their innovations and digital investments.

  • Established in 2019, EPAM Vietnam has been constantly expanding our team and capabilities with two offices in Ho Chi Minh City and Hanoi. We offer a multicultural environment where our tech talents can proactively develop world-class solutions directly with international clients. At EPAM Vietnam, we adopt a global growth strategy, thinking and acting like start-ups, working in multi-disciplinary teams, and delivering results. You’ll find interesting challenges typically dealt with at a start-up, yet you’ll be in a highly professional corporate setting.
  • Learn more at www.epam.com and follow us on facebook.

 

How we hire
Here, we summarize the typical journey to finding a job within EPAM:

  • Step 1: General interview with our talent attraction specialist
  • Step 2: Technical interview with our technology experts*
  • Step 3: Manager interview with a hiring manager
  • Step 4: Client interview**
  • And you are ready to join the team!
  • Not sure if you meet all the requirements? No problem. Let’s talk anyway and find out more!
  • It takes 1 min of application to start the journey with us. Apply now!

*Certain positions may necessitate entry tests tailored to specific client and project requirements.

**A project-specific interview may precede the client interview to assess project fit.

job_description_formatted:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!

‎

‎

Job Description

As a Content Strategist you’ll help create and execute content strategies that strengthen the Traveloka brand. In this role, you’ll work closely with various teams to ensure our brand story is reflected consistently across all campaigns and materials. This is a collaborative position that combines research, creativity, and attention to detail to support the team’s success.

Responsibilities:

  • Assists with owning Traveloka’s brand voice, tone, and positioning to align with business goals.
  • Leads collaboration efforts across social media marketing, influencer management and creative teams to bring insights and consistency to projects.
  • Uses research and audience data to help guide content decisions.
  • Collaborates with content creators to develop engaging materials for different platforms and audiences.
  • Ensures content strategies meet the specific needs of each platform, region, and target audience.
  • Fosters cross-functional collaboration with internal teams to maintain alignment with brand messaging and guidelines.
  • Collects and analyzes feedback from marketing teams to improve content quality and effectiveness.
  • Monitors and reports on key brand performance metrics like awareness and familiarity.
  • Stays informed about content trends and best practices to help improve team outputs.
  • Strategically connects Traveloka’s products and solutions to the brand narrative, reinforcing its value and differentiation in the marketplace.

‎

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communication, Journalism, or related field (Master’s preferred).
  • Minimum 3+ years of experience in social media and content marketing.
  • Excellent consulting, writing, editing (photo/video/text), presentation & communication skills.
  • Proven success in the ability to drive organic growth through creative and data-informed content strategies.
  • Extensive knowledge of social media platforms, influencer marketing and digital channel optimization.
  • Skilled in interpreting and analyzing data to effectively communicate performance insights and - Provide evidence-based recommendations to all stakeholders.
  • Experience managing content in markets at varying levels of maturity, with a track record of successfully adapting strategies based on unique market demands.
  • Demonstrated experience in building, mentoring and leading a team, with a collaborative and inclusive approach.
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills to articulate strategies clearly to stakeholders and team members.

‎

If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

job_summary: Headquartered in St. Lucia, West Indies, Euro Exim Bank is an award-winning international trade finance institution providing trade solutions for importers, contractors, and exporters. We have a Class ‚ÄòA‚Äô international banking license from the Financial Services Regulatory Authority of St. Lucia (FSRA), a proud member of the Caribbean Association of Banks (CAB) and the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC). Working with a global network of partnerships, we currently have a representative office in London. The successful candidate will take initiative and be a self-starter and enjoy being part of a dynamic team. This role would ideally suit a diligent and reliable individual who is a team player with well-developed interpersonal skills. The Role Your Responsibilities Will Include Your main task is to attract new clients (sales) involved in international trade such as exporters and importers by offering them our trade finance services such as LC (Letter of Credit, SBLC (Stand-by Letter of Credit), BG (Bank Guarantee) necessary for them to trade successfully in the global market. Identify opportunities (lead generation) and generate sales from your country of residence. Build and maintain strong customer relationships and assist with all relevant client checks. Review Trade Finance client information in respect of Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Know Your Customer (KYC), and Counter-Terrorism Finance (CTF) requirements. Main Features Of The Job Freelance basis only (this is NOT a permanent position) Working from home in your country of residence (this is NOT an office-based position) There is NO investment or fee required from you. Ideal Profile Skills Required 1+ years of experience in financial consultation, corporate advisory, corporate and institutional banking, business banking, or any related/similar sector Highly accomplished in sales and lead generation Excellent communication and negotiation skills An understanding of KYC, AML, and PEPs is advantageous Outstanding academic performance Accuracy, diligence, and a high level of attention to detail A mobile phone, a PC with internal or external webcam capability, and reliable internet What's on Offer? Euro Exim Bank, an award-winning and high-performing global financial institution is seeking freelance-based professionals to sell trade finance services to exporters and importers worldwide. job_description_formatted:
Headquartered in St. Lucia, West Indies, Euro Exim Bank is an award-winning international trade finance institution providing trade solutions for importers, contractors, and exporters. We have a Class ‘A’ international banking license from the Financial Services Regulatory Authority of St. Lucia (FSRA), a proud member of the Caribbean Association of Banks (CAB) and the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC). Working with a global network of partnerships, we currently have a representative office in London.

The successful candidate will take initiative and be a self-starter and enjoy being part of a dynamic team. This role would ideally suit a diligent and reliable individual who is a team player with well-developed interpersonal skills.

The Role

Your Responsibilities Will Include

  • Your main task is to attract new clients (sales) involved in international trade such as exporters and importers by offering them our trade finance services such as LC (Letter of Credit, SBLC (Stand-by Letter of Credit), BG (Bank Guarantee) necessary for them to trade successfully in the global market.
  • Identify opportunities (lead generation) and generate sales from your country of residence.
  • Build and maintain strong customer relationships and assist with all relevant client checks.
  • Review Trade Finance client information in respect of Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Know Your Customer (KYC), and Counter-Terrorism Finance (CTF) requirements.

Main Features Of The Job

  • Freelance basis only (this is NOT a permanent position)
  • Working from home in your country of residence (this is NOT an office-based position)
  • There is NO investment or fee required from you.

Ideal Profile

Skills Required

  • 1+ years of experience in financial consultation, corporate advisory, corporate and institutional banking, business banking, or any related/similar sector
  • Highly accomplished in sales and lead generation
  • Excellent communication and negotiation skills
  • An understanding of KYC, AML, and PEPs is advantageous
  • Outstanding academic performance
  • Accuracy, diligence, and a high level of attention to detail
  • A mobile phone, a PC with internal or external webcam capability, and reliable internet

What's on Offer?

  • Euro Exim Bank, an award-winning and high-performing global financial institution is seeking freelance-based professionals to sell trade finance services to exporters and importers worldwide.
  • The magnetic force of our global sales team is the commission scheme ranging from 6.5% to 15% on successful transaction volumes (terms & conditions apply) The Job

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team The communication team builds high-throughput solutions for sending out messages (push notifications, emails, SMS) to millions of users and running marketing campaigns by building a very scalable IFTTT engine. We take pride in building distributed systems that have a real impact on the lives of millions of users in our endeavour to out-serve the underserved population. Get to Know the Role You will be responsible for building, growing, and leading a team of engineers focused on delivering high quality deliverables. You will have opportunities to develop backend and mobile components. Not only will you get to collaborate with the engineers, product, business, and program management teams to be on top of your deliverables, but you will also serve as a mentor to your teammates to help them grow. You will work onsite at CMC Creative Space, district 7, HCMC and report to the Manager, who is based in Singapore. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Lead a team of engineers across different tech stacks. You'll participate in code and design reviews to maintain our high development standards. Partner with cross functional leaders across product, design, analytics to build the product roadmap, set customer-focused metrics and experiment designs. Lead the quarterly planning and build a smooth execution plan with the team for securing the delivery of product and engineering roadmap. Set the engineering strategy and engineering key result targets for the team, consistently improve across testability, availability, security and code quality for your systems and modules. Attract and retain senior engineering talent, actively mentor and develop engineering talent in the team and across Grab. Keep your team staffing aligned with business needs and quickly pivot to changing needs. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need 5+ years of engineering experience on backend technologies. At least 2+ year experience as a successful software engineer manager. Demonstrated experience attracting and retaining main talent. Experience mentoring engineers is critical for this role. A cultural role model with a strong sense of humility and empathy, ready to roll up one's sleeves to help the team achieve engineering excellence. Proficiency in CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab, etc.) Experience with database architect, MySQL, PosgreSQL Experience deploying code in AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud environments Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The communication team builds high-throughput solutions for sending out messages (push notifications, emails, SMS) to millions of users and running marketing campaigns by building a very scalable IFTTT engine. We take pride in building distributed systems that have a real impact on the lives of millions of users in our endeavour to out-serve the underserved population.

Get to Know the Role

You will be responsible for building, growing, and leading a team of engineers focused on delivering high quality deliverables. You will have opportunities to develop backend and mobile components. Not only will you get to collaborate with the engineers, product, business, and program management teams to be on top of your deliverables, but you will also serve as a mentor to your teammates to help them grow. You will work onsite at CMC Creative Space, district 7, HCMC and report to the Manager, who is based in Singapore.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Lead a team of engineers across different tech stacks. You'll participate in code and design reviews to maintain our high development standards.
  • Partner with cross functional leaders across product, design, analytics to build the product roadmap, set customer-focused metrics and experiment designs.
  • Lead the quarterly planning and build a smooth execution plan with the team for securing the delivery of product and engineering roadmap.
  • Set the engineering strategy and engineering key result targets for the team, consistently improve across testability, availability, security and code quality for your systems and modules.
  • Attract and retain senior engineering talent, actively mentor and develop engineering talent in the team and across Grab.
  • Keep your team staffing aligned with business needs and quickly pivot to changing needs.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 5+ years of engineering experience on backend technologies.
  • At least 2+ year experience as a successful software engineer manager.
  • Demonstrated experience attracting and retaining main talent. Experience mentoring engineers is critical for this role.
  • A cultural role model with a strong sense of humility and empathy, ready to roll up one's sleeves to help the team achieve engineering excellence.
  • Proficiency in CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab, etc.)
  • Experience with database architect, MySQL, PosgreSQL
  • Experience deploying code in AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud environments

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_summary: Project Description Luxoft is establishing a strong UI/UX Automotive team in China, Shanghai. This team will work on UX and UI topics for several international car manufacturers, focusing on the Asian market. Innovative concepts and amazing graphics need to be developed for the digital cockpit of future vehicles. We are looking for UI Designers to join this team, working on UI Design and Graphic concepts in the Automotive field. Responsibilities Develop and design of graphical user interfaces for complex in-Vehicle Information and Communication systems for Chinese market. Preparation of screen design for target integration including color management and quality control. Design and specify user interfaces and animations using participatory and iterative design techniques, including customer workshops and other forms of requirements discovery. Effectively communicate research findings, conceptual ideas, detailed design, and design rationale both verbally and visually. Create and analyze design language in order to produce design prototypes and design systems. Working with an interdisciplinary team that includes other designers, human factors, project management, business and brand strategists, and hardware and software developers. Skills Must have: Bachelor degree or above in Visual design or a related digital design discipline. At least 5 years of user interface/animation design experience. Experience in Automotive Industry. Strong knowledge of user interface design processes and methodology. Proficiency with design and prototyping tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, and Figma. A passion for creating products that resonate emotionally with people. Good communication and organization skills. Demonstrated ability to present design ideas and results internally and externally with customer. Nice to have: Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment. International and multicultural business experience. Ability to present cohesive design approaches to a non-design audience (including business, product, and technology teams). Advanced in English, both speaking and writing Language: English: B1 Intermediate or Chinese: B2 Upper Intermediate Show more Show less

job_description_formatted:
Project Description

Luxoft is establishing a strong UI/UX Automotive team in China, Shanghai. This team will work on UX and UI topics for several international car manufacturers, focusing on the Asian market. Innovative concepts and amazing graphics need to be developed for the digital cockpit of future vehicles. We are looking for UI Designers to join this team, working on UI Design and Graphic concepts in the Automotive field.


Responsibilities

  • Develop and design of graphical user interfaces for complex in-Vehicle Information and Communication systems for Chinese market.
  • Preparation of screen design for target integration including color management and quality control.
  • Design and specify user interfaces and animations using participatory and iterative design techniques, including customer workshops and other forms of requirements discovery.
  • Effectively communicate research findings, conceptual ideas, detailed design, and design rationale both verbally and visually.
  • Create and analyze design language in order to produce design prototypes and design systems.
  • Working with an interdisciplinary team that includes other designers, human factors, project management, business and brand strategists, and hardware and software developers.


Skills

Must have:

  • Bachelor degree or above in Visual design or a related digital design discipline.
  • At least 5 years of user interface/animation design experience.
  • Experience in Automotive Industry.
  • Strong knowledge of user interface design processes and methodology.
  • Proficiency with design and prototyping tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, and Figma.
  • A passion for creating products that resonate emotionally with people.
  • Good communication and organization skills.

job_summary: You will be responsible for the efficient running of the division in line with Hyatt Hotels Corporation's Corporate Strategic Priorities, whilst meeting employee, guest and owner expectations. To ensure the efficient and economic operation of the Engineering Department in support of all other operating Departments, supplying services as required to the entire operation, and maintaining equipment, building, and grounds in optimum condition. Your focus is to deliver an unmatched product and create a welcoming and thoughtful service environment for our colleagues and guests. You will effectively manage hotel projects ensure that the building, machines and equipment are properly maintained. You will coach and develop a fully engaged and inspired Engineering team. As part of the pre-opening team, you will hit the ground running by following up on handover tasks and ensure that the property is in optimum condition. Moving forward, you will oversee implementation of all property and equipment preventive maintenance and repairs, monitor life safety systems and utilities, and administer the department in compliance with corporate standards and local codes and regulations to protect assets, guests and associates. Your Profile Has a Degree in Engineering or equivalent. Minimum 2 years work experience as Chief Engineer or Director of Engineering in international hotel chain. Well versed in preventive maintenance, installation and equipment and project management Strong leadership skills to coach and manage a highly localised team. Good spoken and written English and Vietnamese. Proficient in MS Office and Outlook. Show more Show less

job_description_formatted:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates.

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

Generative AI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills.

Responsibilities:

  • Content Creation & Refinement: Create and refine content to ensure accuracy and relevance across a variety of topics, while also developing references and examples of tasks.
  • Experts Acquisition: Assess the qualification tests of experts, ensuring their competency.
  • Chat Moderation: Provide support by addressing project-related questions from other experts in Discord chats, especially those related to project guidelines.
  • Auditing Work: Review and evaluate tasks completed by other experts, ensuring they align with project guidelines. Provide constructive feedback, verify expertise-related information, and edit content as necessary to improve quality

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You have a Master's or PhD degree in Electrical Engineering
  • You have at least 5 years of professional experience.
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
  • Experience in Generative AI/Prompt engineering/Reviewing
  • Experience in teaching/educating/lecturing/training in your domain area.
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines.
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

Ensure accurate control of documentation and co-ordinate with other functions for team achievement; Record marketing expenses, marketing materials, marketing travel arrangements; Responsible for processing expenses and advance for marketing activities; Liaise with vendor on purchasing/replenishment for Marketing meeting if requested. Ensures all promotional processes are in adherence to guidelines and act in compliance with Code of Ethics. Coordinate key meetings/events/conferences/workshops and department meetings. Attend meetings and produce material and meeting notes accurately if required. Maintain some basic knowledge of all products so inquiries from both vendors and customers can be primarily managed in the absence of a member of the FF team. Role Requirements Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business, Finance, or Pharmacy. Fluent in both Vietnamese and English, with strong communication skills. 2‚Äì3 years of experience in an administrative or support role. Proficient in Microsoft Office applications, including Word, PowerPoint, and Excel. Prior experience working in a multinational pharmaceutical company is a plus. Excellent organizational and time management skills. Why Sandoz? Generic and Biosimilar medicines are the backbone of the global medicines industry. Sandoz, a leader in this sector, touched the lives of almost 500 million patients last year and while we are proud of this achievement, we have an ambition to do more! With investments in new development capabilities, state-of-the-art production sites, new acquisitions, and partnerships, we have the opportunity to shape the future of Sandoz and help more patients gain access to low-cost, high-quality medicines, sustainably. job_description_formatted:
Job Description

Sandoz continues to go through an exciting and transformative period as a global leader and pioneering provider of sustainable Biosimilar and Generic medicines. As we continue down this new and ambitious path, unique opportunities will present themselves, both professionally and personally. Join us, the future is ours to shape!

As an Event & Operation Executive, you will be responsible for the independent delivery of profound administrative services in a local and a global context. Ensure service levels are delivered in line with site requirements.

Your Responsibilities Include, But Not Limited To

  • Provide support to Marketing and Field force function with a full range of administrative support to assist with the success of the company such as logistics and materials of symposia, congresses, events, conferences, workshops training sessions with registration, coordination, organizing as instructed; Assist Product Managers or KAM on proposal, request, contract, expense reports, ad-hoc tasks.
  • Ensure accurate control of documentation and co-ordinate with other functions for team achievement; Record marketing expenses, marketing materials, marketing travel arrangements; Responsible for processing expenses and advance for marketing activities; Liaise with vendor on purchasing/replenishment for Marketing meeting if requested.
  • Ensures all promotional processes are in adherence to guidelines and act in compliance with Code of Ethics.
  • Coordinate key meetings/events/conferences/workshops and department meetings. Attend meetings and produce material and meeting notes accurately if required.
  • Maintain some basic knowledge of all products so inquiries from both vendors and customers can be primarily managed in the absence of a member of the FF team.

Role Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, or Pharmacy.
  • Fluent in both Vietnamese and English, with strong communication skills.
  • 2–3 years of experience in an administrative or support role.
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office applications, including Word, PowerPoint, and Excel.
  • Prior experience working in a multinational pharmaceutical company is a plus.
  • Excellent organizational and time management skills.

Why Sandoz?

Generic and Biosimilar medicines are the backbone of the global medicines industry. Sandoz, a leader in this sector, touched the lives of almost 500 million patients last year and while we are proud of this achievement, we have an ambition to do more!

With investments in new development capabilities, state-of-the-art production sites, new acquisitions, and partnerships, we have the opportunity to shape the future of Sandoz and help more patients gain access to low-cost, high-quality medicines, sustainably.

Our momentum and entrepreneurial spirit is powered by an open, collaborative culture driven by our talented and ambitious colleagues, who, in return for applying their skills experience an agile and collegiate environment with impactful, flexible-hybrid careers, where diversity is welcomed and where personal growth is encouraged!

Commitment To Diversity & Inclusion

We are committed to building an outstanding, inclusive work environment and diverse teams' representative of the patients and communities we serve.

#Sandoz

job_description_formatted:
LARION, a global software outsourcing partner with 2 decades deep industry expertise. We are a 100% Vietnam technology company specializing in turnkey solutions and building highly skilled development teams for companies of all size and types of business. Run by a team of successful entrepreneurs and dedicated technical experts - LARION is a unique symphony where we create a frictionless future for customers with passion, while maintaining full compliance with your needs and objectives.


We are looking for a talented Senior C++ Embedded Engineer to join the project development of digital LCD measuring instruments for various types of vehicles.


I. What You’ll Do

- Design, develop, and maintain embedded software using C++ in a Linux environment for digital LCD measuring instruments

- Work with cross-functional teams to understand customer needs and translate them into software solutions.

- Develop and maintain embedded systems for optimal performance.

- Work closely with hardware engineers to ensure smooth integration between software and hardware.

- Conduct code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting to ensure high-quality software delivery.

- Continuously improve the development process, identifying areas for optimization and proposing improvements.

- Document software designs, processes, and solutions to ensure clarity and maintainability.


II. What You’ll Bring

- 4+ years of experience in C++ embedded systems or automotive software.

- Proficiency in Linux for building custom Linux distributions and embedded systems.

- Have good experience with the Qt framework for GUI development in embedded systems, including QML for dynamic user interfaces.

- Experience with multi-threading, and multi-process programming.

- Experience with CAN bus protocol for communication in automotive or embedded systems.

- Knowledge of encryption libraries for secure communication and data handling.

- Strong understanding of OOP and design patterns.

- Familiarity with hardware-level development and integration.

- Experience in Agile development environments.

- Familiarity with Git, Jenkins, Docker.

- Good English communication.


III. Why You'll Love Working Here

1. Workplace

  • Join a vibrant team working on cutting-edge projects.
  • Collaborate with global experts to enhance your skills.
  • Thrive in a culture of openness and respect, encouraging your full potential.


2. Benefits Comprise

  • Competitive compensation: 13th-month salary and performance bonuses.
  • A flexible working model exclusively applies for this job, allowing you to join us from anywhere
  • Comprehensive healthcare coverage, including accident insurance.
  • Generous allowances: lunch, marriage, newborn, bereavement, and more.
  • Fully equipped pantry for a comfortable lunchtime experience.
  • Diverse sports and social activities: Yoga, football, badminton, tech clubs, charity, etc.
  • Annual company trip and team-building events.
  • Recognition awards: Quarterly, annual, individual, team, and long-term service honors.
  • Advanced English and soft skills training for career growth.
  • Engaging monthly events: Happy gatherings, mini-games, team birthday celebrations, year-end party, and more.
  • Exclusive company support funds for personal loans (home, vehicle, tuition, etc.).


Let’s embark on your career path journey with LARION at phuongnnh@larion.com


Gentle notice to our candidate about Decree No.13/2023/NĐ-CP

- According to Decree No.13/2023/NĐ-CP on protecting personal data, LARION would apply a "Personal Data Processing Agreement" with all candidates to ensure compliance with the decree.

- By submitting this application to LARION, you agree to allow LARION to proceed with your provided information by "Personal Data Processing Agreement" that you have read, fully understood and agreed to the entire content at link https://larion.com/privacy-policy/

job_description_formatted:
NOTE: This is an unpaid Internship

1. Required Skills/Experience

  • Experience using WordPress
  • Good English skills
  • Ability to solve problems with minimal direction, supervision

2. Initial Responsibilities

  • Testing a series of custom features in a site
  • Building modules
  • Translation management

3. Target Responsibilities

  • Custom WordPress site builds – take a Photoshop file and apply the styles to a WordPress child theme, work with Beaver Builder, PHP, and WordPress child theme templates to set up custom features and layouts as needed.
  • Modify and create new Beaver Builder modules to add support for features, complex functionality, and intricate styling that aren’t natively available.
  • Develop and maintain custom themes with an eye towards automation and end user-friendliness
  • Extend 3rd party plugins with WordPress hooks, template overrides, or creative solutions to accomplish time-sensitive tasks
  • Plugin troubleshooting/problem-solving.
  • Feature documentation.
  • Taking screenshots and writing out steps/instructions to be used in Thinkific for course building
  • Project debriefs – sharing your experience with a site or project build with the team.

4. Examples of tasks:

Marketing needs to make customisations to their events in Beaver Builder to display an external link that they can change from the WordPress admin. You would add a custom field that shows on posts with something like Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) and then modify the Beaver Builder post feed module to display data from the ACF field on the frontend.

A website with hundreds of already created posts and pages is being redesigned. You would create page templates and widgets that account for dynamic content in order to restyle existing posts in a way that ensures nothing slips through the cracks while working within the confines of the already existing website or proactively identifying new technology that would better serve the redesign and decrease redesign time.

A designer you’re working with has finished their mock-up on a new site build with great UI/UX, but is unsure how to handle dynamic content within their design. You proactively suggest solutions and utilize responsive frontend best practices to ensure the website looks good on every browser and every device regardless of what the content looks like. We will use WordPress or HubSpot only so it is important to learn or be certified on these.

5. Required Tools

  • Internet connection
  • GIMP or Photoshop CS 5.x or any version supporting grouped layers
  • Text editor or IDE capable of editing WordPress code, Notepad++

6. Training opportunities

Here at TRG, people's development is the main focus we want to find smart but not yet experienced people and make them become the best! We offer almost unlimited learning resources for our people.

   As our Intern, you will

  • Receive direct training from Seniors in the industry segment
  • Work with large scale system business firm
  • Freedom to try and make errors
  • Over 1,000 English Books are waiting for you to chew in (and coming more)
  • Get coaches from the founder, Rick Yvanovich, who is not only an Entrepreneur but also an Executive Coach, a Speaker with CIMA Certified, CGMA Certified and CPA (Australia) Certified.

7. Benefit: 

  • Friendly and supportive colleagues
  • International working environment – we are inclusive and diverse
  • Good branding name in your CV
  • Opportunities to attend company events such as Company Outing trip, Christmas Party, CSR activities; 
  • Flexible working hours
  • Working from home option

8. Working environment

  • Hard-working attitude: we strive our best to provide our customers with the best possible solutions to aid their problems.
  • No gossip: we do not care why you take too many days off, or why you are working from home all the time.
  • Work hard, play harder: we like to hang out at PJ's Coffee downstairs, or grab a couple of drinks together on the weekends.
  • Employee engagement activities: connect, get to know staff from different departments and have fun with our weekly virtual activities.
  • Transparency: we have weekly CEO briefing, a 30-minute online catch-up session hosted by our CEO, where he updates everyone about the company status.
  • Kaizen: we like things to be perfect, but we know nothing is perfect, so we never stop improving.
  • Flexibility: Smart casual dress code & flexible work hours

Recruitment process

  • Apply via our Career page: https://careers.trginternational.com/ --> Pre-hire assessments & Hireflix screening interview (received via email right after your application submission on our career site, please complete them within 3 days) --> HR quick call --> Final round

By creating innovative technology that makes selling cars better for our customers, and buying and owning cars better for theirs. We use cutting-edge technology to link our clients‚Äô systems, departments and sites. We provide an open technology platform that‚Äôs shaping the industry for the future. We use data to help clients become more efficient, increase profitability and give more customers an amazing experience. Want to be part of it? The Role The Role of the Senior Automation Test Engineer at Keyloop is to design, build, test, and deploy effective test solutions that help facilitate shared team goals. Working in a dynamic, cross-functional and multi-national Agile team comprising of varied stakeholders. Senior Automation Test Engineers are involved with testing a range of different software products ranging in scope from complex analytical data structures from Amazon Web Services (AWS), to intricate data API‚Äôs as well as enquiry systems, CMS, and stock management platforms. Primarily responsible for preventing defects by working with your team to build quality into the delivery process. Working with Software Engineers, Product Owners and Scrum Masters to establish the testing requirements of the team. Senior Automation Test Engineers will also contribute to the testing of newly developed features, and guiding defects through the evolution of branch through to release testing and deployment. Taking part in agile ceremonies and planning activities the Senior Automation Test Engineer will be responsible for defining and implementing the tests that ensure the platform‚Äôs features are developed to meet the specified functional, performance, security, and reliability requirements. You will write test scripts, design and implement test processes, and managing their continued improvement to deliver scalable and maintainable tests building in automation where possible. Implementation of automated scripts is important to developing new testing strategies to help improve the team‚Äôs efficiency and evolution. Key Responsibilities Working with your team to ensure quality is built-in throughout delivery. Working with Testers, Developers, and Architects to provide solutions which are consistent with the strategies of Keyloop on both Greenfield and Brownfield field projects. Ensuring own and team‚Äôs adherence to best practice principles including source control, testing, development, and deployment. Work independently, managing day to day workload and priorities, and taking accountability for direction and output. Communicating effectively with all roles within the Agile product team, conveying complex information and concepts to both technical and non-technical colleagues. Mentoring and coaching Test Engineers Contribute and maintain testing standards and procedures, including documentation Record and report on issues and key metrics Work with teams and clients to resolve issues during the delivery process Work with other seniors, leads and managers to enhance testing capabilities over all teams. Being responsible for information security and data protection, and supporting the business in complying with any legal obligations imposed upon it through positive actions.
